1.content:
The government is always developing technology to keep people safe, but what happens when they fail? What happens to the project do they lock it up, or just throw it away?

Well anyway the government had just invented a prototype device named the “Reducer.” It was a device that could reduce anything down to a fraction of its original size.

However human test subject was all that was left to complete it's testing, but with no volunteers the higher ups got tired of waiting and the funding was cut. The only thing left to remember was the Prototype gun which was lost in an accident is space. The gun was being used in deep space testing when it was lost in a meteor shower.

However the gun itself is made of in indestructible metal. It was presumed lost in earth's gravitational field. It actually had crash landed some where on earth, and that's where this story begins at the home of...
1.title: The Reducer

choices: He tries it again and sees what else it can do.
He goes back to show to his friends.
He wants to use it on some students.
He waits until school the next day to try it out.
He goes home and uses it on his family members.
11.content:
Samuel King was your average high school jock, strong and good looking. He was always a jerk to others and was never punished for it. It was his last year at his high school, and he wanted to leave is mark on it forever.

While practicing after school one day he saw a shooting star fall from the sky and land just outside the football field. Wanting to gloat about being the first one to see it to the school newspaper, he left his team and went to go search alone.

"Ah-ha! There it is." he said as he rushed toward the fallen object which was, now inside a crater. When he looked inside he saw there was a gun shaped object inside. He took no caution and picked it up, and took a quick look at it before aiming it at a large tree. He was amazed when he saw the tree dwindle in size.

"This thing can shrink things!?" he exclaimed out loud. It was hard to believe something like this existed in the real world and not in movies. His head swelled with ideas of what he could do.
11.title: In the Hands of a Jock.

choices: Mini-Cheerleaders!
Mega-Cheerleaders!

Looking back at the dial on the Reducer he saw that that it could enlarge things also. So he switched it to enlarge and fired it at the tree he just got done shrinking before. It was restored to its original height, but Sam held down the trigger longer and if grew bigger that it was before.

"This thing is awesome!" he said out loud. He turned and walked back to the field, his football practice was over and the cheerleader practice had begun. This was perfect because he wanted to test the device on human beings.

"I hope this works he said." as he made his way behind the stands careful to be noticed by anyone. Fortunately he had a clear shot that could hit all of the girls at once the only choice was whether to shrink them, or enlarge them?

"Looks like is shrinks clothes too." Sam said, still staring at the tiny figures in the grass. He didn't want to get to close he might kill them by accident. He was more excited about the gun and his own personal uses for it than his first victims.

"They're insignificant now!" He thought to himself. Of course he still felt guilty he could just restore them and leave before they realize he had anything to do with it. What should he do?

"They can fend for themselves!" Sam said, "They were all bitchy anyways." As he headed off he noticed the girl of his dreams, Rachael. "Oh man," thought Sam "I would love to play around with her for just a while..."

"Well, as of this morning, I can!" He looked around and made sure no one was around but himself and Rachael. "Cost is clear." thought Sam. He quickly caught up to the 5'6 Brunette and blurted a quick "Uh, Hey Rachael! Your looking nice today!"

"Aww, that's so sweet," replied Rachael "thanks Sammy!" Sammy. He hated that nickname. "Hey Rachael..." Sam started. "Yes, Sam?" she replied. "This is going to sound strange but...have you ever dreamt of being tiny?"

"Uh...I don't think I follow..." she said with a slight laugh. "You feeling okay, Sammy?" they both laughed. "Well, Rachael...um...you didn't answer my question..."

"You're serious aren't you?" asked Rachael. Sam nodded. "Well...to tell you the truth....man...yes, actually, I have." Sam was wide-eyed at her response. "Weird, huh? That's a scret I thought that I would never reveal to anyone..." She quickly noticed that Sam was getting hard. "Woah, uh, Sam I'm going to leave now...see ya around!" She quickly turned to leave when...
11111.title: Rachael

111111.content:
Rachael turned to walk away and suddenly the world before her eyes grew to massive proportions. She shrunk so much that the grass around her were as tall as trees, and she could barely make out anything beyond the first few blades in front of her. All she could see was the blue sky above.

Worried, she began to walk forward and noticed a cool shadow hovering over her and everything around. She looked up through the hole in the canopy and saw a pair of enormous legs, as high as high-rises on on either side of her, and as she continue to lift her head, the crotch, abdomen, and visage of Sam, the one responsible for doing this to her. He didn't appear to see her.

Suddenly she felt the ground shake and saw the bottom of Sam's foot hovering in the air. He was about to accidently step on her. She tried to make a break for it as the vast foot descended over her and made it. His foot came down, loudly crunching the tall grass blades behind her. She looked up again and saw him examining the ground with a grin. She waved her arms. Anything was better than being stomped into jelly by a careless, self-involved senior.

Sam searched the ground around himself to find Rachael, who he was sure was shrunken at this exact location. He crouched down, and leaned over, and looked about the area beneath him.

He shifted his legs and went full circle looking at the ground this way. Suddenly the thought that he had stepped on her occured to him. He stood back up, lifted up his feet one at a time, and checked them for a flattened girl stuck on the bottom. Upon doing this, he spotted Rachael hanging on to dear life on the shoelace of his right sneaker. He grinned wickedly, took off the sneaker, and held it it over his head so that Rachael holding the lace was directly in front of his eyes. He then brought his palm underneath the lace and let her drop off gently into his vast hand.

"You're lucky I didn't crush you," he said playfully.

Sam rushes back to the field as fast as he could. When he arrived he saw that the field was empty, and the parking lot was empty.

"I guess the guy's had to go home." he thought to himself. He walked across the field, and went to his car, but before he got in he looked to see a beautiful blond hair girl. She was getting in her car and about to drive off.

"Hey!" Sam yelled trying to grab her attention. The girl didn't answer at all, and closer inspection showed she was wearing headphones. Then Sam remembered the gun in his pocket, he pulled it out and thought maybe it was time to cause a little mischief. He aimed the gun at the girl's car and fired it. He watched as the car dwindled down until it was the size of a RC.

Sam walked over to the car as it tried to drive away, the girl probably hasn't even noticed yet. There were so many things he could do with a toy sized car, the equally tiny driver inside. Of course there was also the option of leaving it there and go find more way's to play with his toy.

Sam walks over to the toy sized car and plucks the tiny girl out of car. She screams when his giant hand wraps around her body and quickly hoists her up to his eye view. She looked rather terrified but then again who wouldn't be in her situation.

"Please let me go, please!" she yells out. Sam ignores her please and opens the door to his own car using his free hand and climbs inside. He drops her into the cup holder so she couldn't escape, and drives to his house.

"Home sweet home!" he says laughing as again grabs the minuscule female and closes and locks his car. He opens the door to his house and what luck his parents are home yet, but his siblings are. The girl still screams but her voice doesn't carry very far.

When Sam enters is room he sets the girl on his desk and sits on his bed staring at the quivering little thing.

11211.content:
Millions ideas flew through Sam's mind he was now in control of a tiny, and quite attractive young woman. The girl was quivering on top of Sam's desk, looking around nervously at her surroundings. "What's your name woman?" Sam bellowed. The girl merely cupped her hands over her eyes and broke down on her knees. "Answer me!" the Sam yelled.

"S-Sarah." The girl said quivering, still quite shaken up by the whole ordeal. Her dismay doesn't even affect Sam the slightest. He displays his sense of power by slowly moving his left hand toward her body. Sarah knowing what this action would lead too tries desperately to push the hand away from her, but her tiny size barely gave her the strength to shove a single finger much less the whole hand.

"Stay away from me, you psycho!" Sarah cried, as she slowly stumbled back to the edge of the desk. Sam didn't reply to her, he simply moved his hand at even greater speeds toward her body and succeeded in grabbing her. Then with his free hand he start to slowly undress her, while carefully inspecting each bit of skin that slowly becomes visible. Sarah starts crying out in fear of what will happen next. Just as her shirt was almost fully removed some calls out from another room.

"Samuel, you get down here this instant!" An older woman's voice (who was most likely his mother) called from downstairs. Sam left loose a scoff and dropped Sarah back on the desk.

"We'll finish this when I get back." Sam said following with a deep almost sinister chuckle while he hastily left his room. Sarah looked around at Sam's gargantuan room. On the bed she noticed a gun like object sitting on the bed right next to where her captor was sitting moments ago.

"Is that the thing he used to shrink me?" She said to herself, while she put her clothes back on. She very sure about it, she just remembered sitting in her car and then giant fingers hoist her right out of it. Sara took another moment to look around and she spots a cell phone sitting on the desk near her. Perhaps she could contact the police or just someone she knew personally?

A decision had to be made, was she going to use the phone to get help or would she go after the Reducer sitting on the bed? Either way she should probably decide on a plan of action before you know who comes back.

1122.content:
Sam arrived at the lot looking for the tiny car but he couldn't see it right away. He shrugged and began to turned to walk over to his own car. Suddenly he heard a light humming coming from below him. He peered down at his feet and right in front of them, just inches away from where he had stepped, he saw the car he shrunk, with its engine on and the tiny woman inside facing toward him. She was leaning her head forward, awestruck at the enormous legs towering over her. A sly grin spread across Sam's face.

Immediately the girl in the car saw that grin and hit the gas in order to go between Sam's feet. The tiny car began moving over the gravel at a snail's pace and it didn't even make it past his foot before Sam lifted it up and simply stamped it in front of her car to block her path. She stopped lest she crash into his shoe. She climbed out of the vehicle and began running. Sam closed his eyes and laughed. He looked down again but saw she was gone.

He looked all around him but didn't see her anywhere. How did she get so far, he wondered. Then he looked down at his feet again and saw her climbing the shoelace of his right sneaker, using it as a rope to hop up and kick off the side of the sneaker in order to get higher. The sight of this amused Sam.

115111.content:
When the door swung open, Sam watched in awe as his 16 year old goth sister Tara enters the room. She took a quick glimpse around the room before taking a few steps inside. Her truck-sized feet were dangerously close to smashing Sam into oblivion.

"Oh man! What the hell is she doing in my room?" Sam said to himself as he avoided steps his sister made as she entered. She stopped walking for a second and almost as if she had heard his question Tara spoke.

"Sam where the hell are you? I need the CDs I let you borrow back." Tara said in rather annoyed tone. She even when as far as tapping her foot against the floor a few times. A few minor taps for Tara were small scale earthquakes for her older brother.

"That's it I've had it with her. I'm going to shrink her down to the size of a speck and see how she likes being so tiny." Sam thought. He reached his hand in his pocket ready to withdraw the gun. It was then that Sam realized he had made a fatal error. When he stupidly shrunk himself it never even occurred to him that the Reducer didn't shrink along with him.

"Ah crap." Sam said. He then noticed the Reducer sitting on the floor next to Tara's left foot. It was normal sized and way too large for him to operate. This meant that he needed a normal sized person to enlarge him back to normal sized. Before he could even begin to think of a solution Tara spoke again.

"He are my CDs." Tara said grabbing a try of CDs from the desk. Sam quickly came to the conclusion that Tara was his best chance at retuning to normal. She was already in his room and the only one home at the moment. Of course she was about to leave which would leave him stranded if he didn't grab her attention immediately.

"What on earth is this?" Tara said noticing a small toy-like gun on the floor. Sam watched as several large fingers (complete with black colored nails) descended down and grabbed the Reducer. She then took a second to inspect the weapon in her hand.

"He still plays with kids toys?" Tara said chuckling. "Maybe I'll hang on to this just to make him mad." After hearing that Sam let out a deep sigh. Out of the two possible outcomes the worst had occurred. Tara now had the gun and if he didn't somehow get her attention, he could end up tiny for the rest of his life.

Of course he and Tara weren't exactly the best siblings since the two of them were constantly at war with each other. If she found him at such a small size she would take advantage of it and abuse him in ways to horrible for him to imagine.

"Either way it looks like I lose." Sam thought but Tara seemed like the only logical choice. Sam yelled his sister's name several times but of course Tara's normal sized ears just couldn't pick up his shrunken voice from the floor. Sam was running out of options and running out of time. Tara was sure to move again any second from now and if she closed the door Sam would be trapped in his room till who knows when.

Sam approached Tara's large sandal clad foot. His plan was simply to hitch a ride to Tara's room and try to get her attention in there. So began to climb his sister foot, the whole time he climbed he thought about how gross it felt. Reaching the top of the biggest toe he noticed all 5 of her toenails were painted pitch black.

She was about to start moving, which was bad news for Sam who didn't have to time to properly secure himself. One step and Sam could be sent flying to his doom.

So does he manage to hang on?

I wonder if they'll recognize me, Kelly thought as stood in front of the door of Jen's house. She had to reach her right arm out to ring the doorbell. As she waited, she felt the devise in her pocket, thankful it shrunk her cloths with her.

After about half a minute, the door opened. Jennifer 'Jen' Middleton looked down at Kelly. Kelly gasped as she looked up at her older sister in awe. Jen stood at just under 6 feet in height, which was 12 feet by Kelly's new perspective. Jen had a toned, athletic body as a result of years of playing sports in school as well as her current job as a fitness instructor. The workout bodysuit she was wearing displayed her two 36DD breasts. She had shoulder length raven hair and dark brown eyes. Kelly had always felt a little intimidated by her taller, more beautiful older sister. Now Jen looked like an Amazon to her.

Jen stared at her. It was obvious she didn't recognize her younger sister. "Can I help you, miss?" she politely asked.

Kelly wondered if this was a good idea. Summoning her courage, she said. "It's me, Jen."

"Kelly?" Jen's dark eyes widened as she recognized both the voice and the face. "You've ... shrunk! What happened to you?"

"I'll explain, sis" Kelly replied. "Could you let me in?"

"Of course" Jen shook her head, not entirely certain she wasn't dreaming. Kelly cautiously entered Jen's living room. Although the room was familiar, with her reduced scale it all looked strange.

As Kelly looked around her, she heard a childlike voice behind her. "Aunt Kelly, why are you so little?" Kelly turned around and saw Jen's daughter Katie. She had to move her eyes slightly upward to look at her niece. She guessed that Katie was now taller than her by an inch or two. Kelly showed Jen and Katie the devise and explained how she found it and how it shrunk her.

"I wouldn't have believed you, Kelly" Jen said when Kelly finished, "if I didn't see the evidence" She patted her very little sister on the head and smiled. "You sure this can be reversed?"

"I think so"

"Do you want to return to normal?" Jen asked.

Kelly thought for a moment and answered ...

"Excuse me little girl, but this cafe is for big people." he said in a cute childish voice. Kelly just pulled her student ID out of her pocket and showed it to him. She just gasped when he read that she was 16 year old teenage girl.

Her friend's Jen and Denise were sitting at the table talking over a cup of coffee. As Kelly approached them Denise quickly noticed her running towards their table.

"Oh my god! Kelly!?" Jen yelled out drawing the attention of everyone in the cafe. Kelly was starting nervous with everyone staring at her. Denise took another quick look at Kelly.

“Wait! You are Kelly!?” she also yelled out, “What happened to you?”

She always wore dark, mostly black clothing that was skin-tight and coated her face in white make-up and bright shades of lipstick. Her hair colour was constantly changing; today it was orange.

Kaino was not exactly friendly with Paulina, but the two didn't hate each other either. Their interactions mostly consisted of cordial greetings in the hallway. Of all the people who could have found this gun, Paulina was probably the best-case scenario. She was picked on as much as Kaino and while she didn't outwardly express the same rage that Kaino wore on her sleeve, there was a good chance she'd be sympathetic to Kaino's cause. All Kaino had to do was get her attention first. Cautiously, Kaino began making her way over to Paulina, who was now fiddling around with the settings on the odd gun she had just found.

She walked into her older sister's room closing the door behind her and scoped around. She instantly saw the gun sitting on the desk, as it didn't fit in with anything else in the room.

"What this thing doing in her?" she said possibly mistaking it for one of her own toys. She picked it up and took a minute to examine the gun, closely and saw it had letters printed on it. Kelly sighed relieved as Megan grew back, and sat on her bed.
- Wow, did I really shrink?
- You sure did. ...you weren't scared, were you? - she said, and she flopped down on the bed as Megan shook her head. - I'm glad. I would have felt terrible if you had gone through a rough patch.
- What else can this do? - Megan asked, leaning on her sister's legs. She was captivated by the magic of this situation.
- It seems it can enlarge, besides shr... cough - the child jumped on her, then jumped to her feet on the bed.
- Really? That would be fun! Will you enlarge me?
- No, that's out of the question. Fun... that's the problem. As mischievous as you are, as clumsy as I am, we would be a public menace - Kelly replied, smiling sadly. She too would like to test it out.
- And growing where there's no one? Like... in those woods over there. - Megan implored, kneeling on the bed in order to cling to her sister's arm.

Kelly didn't answer; she had just seen a little blue button in the device's belly which framed by the inscription "Reversal". Could it be what she had in mind? Megan's eyes followed her sister as she sat up and walked towards the corridor while she adjusted the Reducer.

* * *

Kelly looked up towards the chalet's roof, then at the device, then played a bit with it; this was pretty exciting. Closing her eyes, she shot it at her face. She nearly didn't feel the process, as she immediately outburst her uniform, growing 13 metres tall in a jiffy. Not that she cared - the perspective was fascinating. Anyway, there would be time for enjoying it later - first things first. Kneeling, she blew into the air a few slates - one of them rebounding against the chimney. As she rubbed the tip of her nose she pressed the reducer -which had grown with her-'s blue button - and the roof was immediately fixed.

Kelly sighed delighted, and flopped down on the floor, turning towards the opened dining room's glass doors - her eyes meeting Megan's. She had a half amazed, half naïvely upset expression which she would later find funny painted in the face. Kelly sat up, feeling a bit awkward - there was obviously a misunderstanding. Well, she would surprise her - she sat up, and as soon as Megan appeared in the threshold she fired the device against her.

She saw that Megan was sitting in the backyard watching a big screen TV that was sitting on the patio. Jessica was sitting on the on Megan's lap, which for Kelly posed a problem.

"That stinks." she said cursing her luck. If she were to fire it at Megan now Jessica would get shrunk too. However she could get them to separate from each other even for a second she shrink Megan back to normal. Of course both plans had their flaws, and either one she tried could probably end up backfiring.
122111212.title: Kelly's Dilemma

choices: The Cheerleaders are practicing out on the field.
All the popular girls are hanging out in the locker room.
1221112121.content:
Kelly takes aim and fires on Megan and Jessica is caught in the blast. Megan shrinks down to normal height and six inch tall Jessica is still sitting in her lap. "Aww man, Kelly, why did you have to ruin all of my fun!?" Megan shouts. Jessica climbs out of her friends lap and runs over to Kelly. "Make me big again!" she asks.

Kelly enlarges Jessica back to her normal height. Megan then comes over. "Kelly, make me big again! I want to be giant!" Megan says, stamping her foot. "Shut up, twerp. You'll hurt yourself." mocks Kelly. "Gah!" Megan screams as she tackles her sister. The blow activates the Reducer and Kelly is caught in the blast. She slowly shrinks and stops at 3 and 3 quarter inches tall. "Megan! Now look what you did!" Kelly yells up at her sister. Megan and Jessica laugh hysterically at Kelly's squeaky voice. Megan picks Kelly up and begins to play with her tiny body.

"Hey! Stop it, Megan!" Kelly orders. "Shut up, twerp!" Megan laughs at her newfound sense of power. "Well, I may not be a giant, but at least I can still boss around my new 'little' sister!" Jessica and Megan play around with Kelly's tiny body.

"Hey Megan, let's see if she can live in the doll house!" Says Jessica. "Yeah!"

They head upstairs into Jessica’s room and break out her toy box putting Kelly next to it. Jessica shuffles through her toys, throwing things behind her back in the process. A 12 inch tall "Optimus Prime" toy lands 1 inch away from Kelly. "AGH!" screams Kelly as she dodges the robot. "Watch it, you little freaks!" she yells at Jessica and Megan.

"Little?" Megan laughs. Kelly realizes the irony and simply sits down and accepts her new size. "Oh my god! Megan look!" Jessica says holding up a Tinkerbell outfit made for a doll. "Ha! Kelly would look so cute in that!" Megan replies joyfully.

"Hey! You can shrink me, you can humiliate me, but you CANNOT make me unfashionable!" screams Kelly. Megan doesn't acknowledge her and begins to remove her clothes. "Get off!" Kelly shouts trying to ward off her sister. Megan removes her top and skirt. "Oooh? Going out in just your undies today, sis?" mocks Megan. "They're so cute with their little frills!" says Jessica. Kelly is embarrassed by her choice of panties.

"Oh my god, she's so cute!" replies Jessica, as she finishes dressing Kelly in the Tinkerbell outfit. Kelly is a bit embarrassed by her clothes. "Kelly, no need to try to hide." Megan says as she picks her sister up.

"Megan, please! Stop this and make me big again!" pleads Kelly. "Hmm...okay, Sis, just stand over here." Megan says. Kelly quickly does so. Megan aims the remote and the beam envelopes Kelly.

"Thank you, Megan." Kelly says with a smile. Just then, Kelly begins to notice that she is actually getting smaller. "Hey! What are you doing!" she screams. "I'm making you smaller! You will be no bigger than an ant! And I will then rule over you!" shouts Megan.

"Megan, you sure about this? I mean, I can hardly see her." asks Jessica. "She had it coming, always picking on me. Now I am in charge." responds Megan.

Kelly inspects her new surroundings. "Oh man, this is bad." She hears a booming voice miles above her. She looks up and is awestruck by what she sees: two giant faces beaming down at her tiny body. "AGH!!!" she screams at the top of her lungs. Megan and Jessica barely hear a squeak and peer down at this tiny teen.

"Come here, tiny." says Megan as she picks Kelly up by the arm with her index finger and thumb. Kelly can't manage to say anything as she is brought up to her sister's gigantic eye.

"I wonder if we can get more of these? We can create our own little city!" says Jessica joyfully. Megan doesn't move but says "That would be interesting..."

"Do you have anything we can keep tiny here in?" asks Megan. "Hmm...." Jessica respond as she tries to find something. She returns with the top of a water bottle. "Put her in here. We can cover it up with some plastic." Megan drops Kelly in and they cover the container. "Oh man..." Kelly says as she travels inside her tiny new home.

"Where to?" Jessica asks. "We'll drop by my sisters high school. Maybe we can grab a few of her friends." Megan responds. "A science experiment, if you will." says Megan. "Oh I will." responds Jessica.

Where at the school do they go?
1221112121.title: REALLY Tiny Kelly, Megan's Town Planning

choices: "I wanna be as big as you!"
"Let's mess with your sister!"
1221112122.content:
Kelly crept around the side of the house, keeping a close eye on the two girls. Luckily, they were too engrossed in whatever they were watching to pay attention to Kelly. She stopped a little ways from Jessica's back porch, keeping her 20 feet away from her sister. Just in case things went wrong...

"All right, Megan," Kelly yelled up at her giant sister. "This has gone on long enough!" Her younger sister and Jessica turned around and saw Kelly pointing The Reducer at them.

"What are you going to do, Kelly?" Megan asked, placing her friend on the ground next to her and sitting up on her knees, to give Kelly her undivided attention.

"You know damn well what I'm going to do!" an angry Kelly said, pointing the gun towards her sister's head. "You destroyed my room, destroyed my things! You're VERY lucky you didn't kill the rest of your family when you grew to 50 feet tall!"

"You know, Kelly," Megan responded calmly. "If you had paid more attention in the first place, I wouldn't have grown this big at all."

Kelly screamed in frustration. That's it! She was ending this now! She took a few steps forward, making sure she had Megan in her sights. She was about to press the trigger, returning her younger sister to her original height...

Megan looked down at the ground, and saw a few chairs, a table and, of course, the TV sitting on the patio. She then looked over at Jessica. They were having such a good time until Kelly showed up. Kelly was always ruining her fun. Well, not this time.

Just as Kelly was about to fire, Megan reached down and tossed a chair at her sister. She didn't throw it too hard; after all, she could really hurt her sister now if she wasn't too careful.

Still, the chair hit Kelly and she was thrown backwards and slammed against Jessica's house, The Reducer knocked from her hands in the process. Megan stood up and, in two steps, was standing over her sister. She bend down and picked up The Reducer. Instantly, the device enlarged itself to fit her giant hand.

Kelly looked up to see her sister looming over her, fiddling with the controls on The Reducer. Kelly knew she had failed.

"Are you all right?' Megan asked, concerned. "I didn't hurt you, did I?"

Kelly sat up and immediately felt her body begin to bruise. Her back and chest hurt. Still, she was in one piece. "I'm fine," she replied, smiling up at her giant younger sister.

Just then, Jessica came running over. "Oh, my God! Are you okay, Kelly?"

"Yeah, yeah. I'm fine."

"Hey, Jessica?" Megan said, as her friend looked up. "Look at what I have." She pointed at The Reducer, a large grin on her face.

"Cool!" her friend replied. "What should we do with it?"

"Well, I could always grow you to my size and we could spend the rest of the day together. OR, we could use this thingy to mess with my sister." A devilish grin spread over Megan's face as she looked down at Kelly.

"So, Jessica, which do you wanna do?"
1221112122.title: She Reveals Herself

choices: Jessica grows to Megan's size
The enlarged reducer is more powerful now...
12211121221.content:
Jessica didn't like the second choice. "That's not nice, Megan" she said. "Just because you are a giant you can't go teasing people"
"I was just joking" Megan said, sitting down behind Kelly.
"But you just threw a chair at your sister. You could have injured her"
"Okay, I'm sorry" Megan apologized, feeling guilty. "So, can I grow you to my size?"
"I'd really like that, but is it okay?" Jessica asked Kelly.
"There's nothing I can do to stop you now, but you will have to accept the consequences if you go on" Kelly said. "What are you going to do when the police shows?"
"Will they?" Megan said.
"Of course they will. Do you think they will just sit and watch TV in their office with two giants walking around?"
"Don't worry, we will shrink down as soon as they ask us to" Jessica said. "There shouldn't be any problem if we don't cause any trouble, I guess?"
"Do as you want then. Just keep an eye on my sister, okay?" Kelly said, thinking Jessica seemed responsible enough.

As Megan shot the device at Jessica she became gigantic in no time, growing past 2, 3, 5, 7, 10... meters tall.
12211121221.title: Kelly's approval

choices: As tall as Sara
Slightly shorter than Sara (by maybe a couple of inches or so...)
12211122.content:
Kelly stepped up to her sister so she wouldn't miss. Megan was having such a good time being big, she just had to give her sister another hug.
"Megan, no not no- ughm!" Kelly was pulled into her sister as Megan gave her another big hug, this one lifted her off the ground.
Suddenly, the trigger was pulled at the beam struck Megan as planned. However, Megan was holding onto Kelly, who shrunk along with her. After a moment, Megan was normal size, holding her "little" sister to her chest. Megan let go of Kelly and Kelly shook her head, trying to focus. The only thing she could see was her sister.
"Come on Megan, I need to get you back... to... normal...?" Kelly trailed off.
She saw that Megan WAS normal size... it was Kelly that had shrunk!
"No! Megan why did you do that?! I'm, like, the size of a 2 year old!" Kelly whined.
Megan giggled at her sister.
"You can be my little sister now, Kelly!" She giggled.
Kelly looked at the screen on the gun. Dang! The power must've really been used to shrink two people at the same time! The recharge was going to take at least an hour or so! Kelly groaned and dropped the gun and it bounched under her bed.
"Well, I guess it'll be safe under there." She said.
Megan couldn't resist anymore. She picked up her sister and sat down, holding Kelly on her lap.
"Hey, Megan! Stop! Now is not the time!" Kelly protested.
Megan ignored her sister's cries and began to put Kelly's blonde hair into pigtails.
Kelly just sighed at let her sister do it. She really had no choice.
"There Kelly! Aw, you look so cute!" Megan said.
Kelly got off her sister. She saw herself in a large mirror on the door. She never thought she'd see herself like this.
"MEGAN!" their mom's voice called out.
Megan came up behind Kelly and covered her mouth.
"YEAH?" Megan shouted back.
"Is your sister up there?" Mom asked from downstairs.
"Yep, we're just playing!" Megan said.
Kelly tried to get out of her sister's grip, but Megan was too strong.
"OK, well I'm going out with your aunt! She left Sara (their two-year-old cousin... probably as tall as Kelly is now) here so Kelly, you have to stay here! We'll be back later this afternoon. Bye girls!" And with that, they were alone.
Megan grabbed Kelly by the hand and ran downstairs.
"Maybe you could share clothes with Sara!" Megan giggled.
Kelly groaned as they went into the living room.

Kelly found that she was...
12211122.title: Megan's new little sis

choices: Megan makes Kelly even smaller
Megan changes someone else's size
122111222.content:
Kelly's feet are practically off the ground as her much bigger sister drags her through the house. "Slow down Megan, I can't keep up with you," pleads Kelly. Megan heard what her sister said, but didn't listen. Megan knows she is in charge right now, of her sister and cousin, maybe even more. The two of them come into the living room and Sara is sitting in her play pen. She is playing with a toy and making goofy noises. Megan picks up her sister and puts her into the play pen with Sara. "Hey, don't put me with her, stop!" Kelly pulls on Megan's hands, but she is just too weak. "Here is someone to play with Sara," says Megan as she lowers Kelly in. Once Kelly is in the pen, she backs up to the nearest corner. Everything inside the pen is huge. The toys look big, so does the pillow, and even her cousin Sara. The toddler stands up with poor balance and walks toward Kelly. She puts out her arms for a hug. "Oh god, even Sara is bigger than me," says Kelly. Kelly only comes up to Sara's shoulders. Kelly screams as she is smoothed by her toddler cousin. Megan enjoys every second of it. Sara starts to loose her balance and falls sideways while holding Kelly. The two of them fall over in the pen. Megan is nearly crying she is laughing so hard. Kelly tries to crawl away from Sara, but the toddler gets a firm grip on her waist and pulls her back. She keeps Kelly close to her like a stuffed animal.

"Ahhh, isn't that cute," teases Megan. "Shut up Megan, get me out of here!" "Fine you cry baby," replies Megan. Megan picks up Kelly and takes her out of the play pen then puts her onto the carpet. "That was crap Megan, I will get you back tor that one," complains Kelly. "Really, and just what are you going to do shorty?" Megan quickly becomes mean and forces her sister backwards. Kelly backs up until she hits a wall. Megan puts her hands onto Kelly's shoulders holds her against the wall. "You see, I am the big sister now, you do not want to anger me. "Stop Megan, that hurts! Why are you acting like this?" Megan laughs and pulls out the reducer. Next,
122111222.title: Big Toddler

choices: Megan makes Kelly the size of a barbie doll
Megan makes Kelly one inch tall
1221112221.content:
Megan laughs at Kelly's plea. "Well, I'm the big sister now, but you're not happy with me as your big sister, Kel. So I guess I'm gonna have to be your bigger sister." and Megan points the Reducer at Kelly.

"NO! Megan please! I .... I'm sorry!" Kelly tries to squirm away from Megan's grip against the wall, but her tiny body doesn't have the strength to fight off her bigger sister. "Too late, Kelly! You had your chance and you blew it, so now it's time for you to pay the price." and Megan squeezes the trigger on the Reducer.

Kelly watches in both horror and panic as everything around her starts getting bigger and bigger, but how small does Megan make Kelly?
1221112221.title: Kelly becomes a littler sister

choices: Megan takes Sara out of the pen
Megan's mom and aunt come home
12211122211.content:
Megan's smile continues to grow larger as Kelly becomes smaller. Kelly leans against the wall as she goes through the shrinking process. Kelly screams up at her younger sister, but Megan just laughs. Kelly shrinks below Megan's knee and stops just above her ankle. Kelly can't believe what her sister has just done to her. "You are supposed to be nice and help me out," wines Kelly. "I DON'T FEEL LIKE BEING NICE. I AM TIRED OF BEING THE LITTLE SISTER, SO FROM NOW ON, I WILL BE THE BIGGEST SISTER, OKAY!" Kelly becomes very angry and runs at her sister's leg. Kelly opens her mouth and bites Megan's left ankle. "OUCH!" Kelly continues to bite and pinch until Megan punts her into the middle of the living room. Kelly cries out as she flies through the room. She lands on her back, but doesn't injure herself due to the carpet.

Megan comes stomping hard right over to where her sister landed. Kelly looks up and sees Megan's bare foot right above her. "No! Stop Megan!" Megan brings her foot down and just misses her sister. Megan laughs while her sister nearly has a heart attack. Kelly just lays where she is as she attempts to catch her breath. Megan looks down at her sister and it really sits it how small she is. "Wow, my foot is even bigger than Kelly now, she is tiny," Megan thinks to herself. Megan then picks up her left foot and hovers it above Kelly. She brings it down slowly on top of her. "DO YOU LIKE MY FEET KELLY? THEY ARE REALLY SOFT, HERE GO AHEAD AND FEEL THEM," booms Megan. She traps her sister under her foot and Megan loves the feeling of Kelly squirming around. Megan rubs the bottom of her foot all over her sister's body. She then takes her big toe and presses right into her sister's chest. "IF YOU GIVE IT A KISS, I WILL STOP KELLY," says Megan. Kelly is reluctant, but anything to get the giant foot off her. Kelly leans her head forward and gives her sister's big toe a kiss. "HOW NICE OF YOU KELLY," laughs Megan. Megan steps off her sister and gives her some space. Next,
12211122211.title: Field Goal

choices: Sara plays gently with her new toy
Sara play roughly with her new toy
122111222111.content:
Kelly brushed herself off and stretched a bit. She couldn't believe this was happening. She had to find a way to get back to normal size. As Kelly focused again, she looked over at Megan. Immediately her heart sank. She was reaching into the playpen to get Sara out.
"Megan NO! What are you doing??" The Barbie size girl cried out.
Megan ignored her sister's cries and picked Sara up and set her down next to her. Kelly almost began to panic. Where would she go? What would she do?
"Look at the dolly over there Sara! Isn't she cute? Go get the dolly, Sara!" Megan said, pointing out Kelly to her baby cousin.
The 2-year-old looked over at Kelly and let out a giggle. Megan let go of Sara and she toddled towards Kelly. Kelly screamed and started to run.
"Come dollwey!" Sara said as she gained on the tiny teen.
Kelly looked back as saw the giant toddler gaining on her. When she looked back, she neglected to pay attention to where she was going and she tripped over one of Sara's toys. The girl hit the ground and rolled for a moment or two before landing on her back. She froze as Sara stopped over her, giggling. Her giant pudgy hand came down and wrapped around Kelly's waist and hoisted her into the air near her face.
"Yay you got the dolly Sara!" Megan said, laughing.
Sara giggled and shook her new toy slightly before returning to show Megan her catch.
"Wow, that's a cool dolly! You have fun with her now, ok?" Megan said, picking the toddler up and setting her back into her pen.
"Megan, what are you doing??" Kelly cried out.
"Oh I'm going in my room to play for a bit, but I'll be back to check on you two. Bye bye!" Megan called, skipping to the stairs and up to her room.
Kelly's heart sank. Suddenly, she felt the grip around her tighten slightly. She looked up at Sara, who was bringing her towards an open mouth.
"Oh, GOD! Sara no!" Kelly protested, but it was too late.
The toddler stuck the tiny teen's head in her mouth and began to suck. Kelly's head was thrust to the roof of the toddler's mouth and pinned between there and her tongue as she sucked. The toddler sat down after a moment and pulled Kelly from her mouth with a *pop*. Kelly coughed and sputtered as she tried to wipe the saliva from her face and took in a breath of fresh air. Sara watch her toy wiggle and cough as she found her pacifier and began to suck on that instead.

Kelly wiped her wet hair out of her face and looked at Sara, wondering what would happen next...
122111222111.title: Sara gets a new dolly

choices: Megan
Sara
1221112221112.content:
Sara than put her hand around the little toy. Her chubby fingers enveloped the tiny woman's waist and, mistaking Kelly for a squeeze toy, she squeezed. All the air was forced out of Kelly;s lungs, as she tried to push the fingers away from her midsection.

Kelly let out a little groan at one point, delighting the toddler, who pushed further in. Kelly's face was blue at this point; she was close to blacking out. All of a sudden, Sara dropped her new toy and Kelly went tumbling towards the ground, which from the shrunken woman's perspective was about ten feet.

As soon as she was released, Kelly sucked in as much air as she could, while she continued to plummet. She hit the bottom of the playpen with a thud and roaned again. Kelly looked down at her stomach and saw a huge bruise, from where the toddler was squeezing. She stood up, painfully, her hand clutching her midsection.

All of a sudden, Kelly saw the giant body of her cousin lurch forward, in an attempt to pick her up again. Kelly dove out of the way, as the baby crashed down next to her. The shrunken woman got up and ran away, trying to find a suitable exit before Sara could reach her again.

Kelly soon reached the wall of the playpen. She looked up and saw that it was made out of cloth, with the material cossed together, forming a rope-ladder, of sorts.

With this being the only way out, Kelly began climbing, hoping that Sara woudn't stand back up and see her.

As Kelly got about halfway up the playpen, she could feel a large hand grab her by the ankle.

Suddenly, the hand snapped backwards, sending Kelly flying in the opposite direction. She landed on top of one of the toddler's teddy bears, about twenty or thirty feet away, from Kelly's perspective.

She shook her head a few times, to get her bearings again, but before she could get up and run away again, Sara's hand was right above her, ready to pick her up again.

The toddler succeeded, and squeezed the midsection of Kelly once more, causing the 13-inch girl to cry out in pain. Suddenly, her air was being constricted again. She knew it was no use, but Kelly again tried to pry the humongous fingers of Sara off of her body. They wouldn't budge an inch.

Above her, the toddler laughed, amused at the toy's attempt to try to free itself. Sara then released her grip on the toy, and Kelly greedily breathed in as much oxygen as she could.

Within a few seconds, however, Kelly was in the same position again, gasping for air. The lucky thing for her, however, was that this time, instead of keeping her stomach compressed for long periods of time, Sara would squeeze her new toy for a few seconds, then release it, delighted at the wheezing sound it produced each time.

Over the next few minutes this continued, with Kelly's air continually being forced out, only to be replenished a few seconds later.

Soon, though, Sara grew tired of her new toy and, noticing her old Tickle-Me-Elmo in the corner of the playpen, tossed Kelly over her shoulder to retrieve her Seseme Street doll.

Kelly landed against the same teddy bear as before, but this time, the force was too great, and she bounced off the stuffed bear and hit her head against the hard, plastic pretend phoe lying next to it.

Kelly grabbed her head in pain, curling up in a ball, in the hopes that Sara wouldn't see her. It hurt for her to breathe, and she eventually placed both hands on her midsection, to try to quell the pain. She didn't dare look under her hands; she feared the bruise oher stomach was only that much bigger and a deeper shade of purple at this point.

Eventually, she driftedd off to sleep, as Sara, the two-year-old toddler, who was now more than double the height of her own, thanks to her sister Megan, continued to play with Elmo...

A few hours late, Kelly woke up, lying in the palm of someone's hand. But whose..?
1221112221112.title: Sara's new squeeze toy

choices: Kelly is returned to her former height
Kelly is shrunk even more
12211122211121.content:
Kelly woke up later, lying in the palm of her younger sister, Megan.

"Did you have a good, long nap, sister dear?" Megan spoke, poking Kelly in the stomach. Each collision Kelly had with her sister's giant fingers sending more pain towards her midsection. Kelly cried out in pain.

"Oh, does it hurt?" Megan asked, unconcerned, poking more forcefully again, and hearing her shrunken sister's cries of agony, before placing her on her nightstand.

Kelly breathed laboriously, her every breath very painful. Finally, after about a minute, Kelly spoke. "Why...are you...doing...this...to...me?" she gasped out.

"Because I can," Megan replied, matter-of-factly.

"But...I was...never...that mean...to you."

"Well, what about that time I needed your help with school? I was having trouble with a few kids that wouldn't stop making fun of me and I walked up to you and do you know what you told me?" Kelly shook her head. "You told me that you didn't have time for someone like me. That I should just learn to accept my place in this world as a loser. That really hurt, Kelly."

"Well," Kelly responded. "In my defense, I was on my period at the time."

Megan stared down at her older sister for a moment, blank-faced. "Okay, I don't even know what that means."

"Or, how about this," Megan continued, starting to choke up. "How about for the last two years, all I've wanted is to get closer to you, but all you've done is ignore me or talk mean to me." She wiped a few tears from her face, sniffling. "All I want is to have a sister, someone to talk to, or to watch crappy movies with on a Friday night. Is that so much to ask for?"

"I guess not," Kelly replied, realizing for the first time just how much she had neglected her younger sister snce she had started going to high school. "I'm sorry for the way I treated you, about how I talked to you and stuff like that. I promise to do better in the future."

"And I'm sorry I hurt you," Megan replied, referring to her sister's bruised midsection.

"I'll be okay in a few days," Kelly said, trying to stand up. Megan saw her older sister struggling to stand, so she placed her hand next to her 13-inch body for support.

"Thank you," Kelly gasped, as she stood upright, still clutching her midsection. "So, what do you say you return me to my former height?"

"How do I know that you'll treat me any better?"

"You have my word."

"Well," Megan replied. "Okay..." She picked up the device and adjusted the settings...
12211122211121.title: Megan's hand

choices: Kelly stays where she is at
Kelly decides to escape
122111222111212.content:
Megan stood up and gently placed her older sister on her bed. Kelly grabbed her midsection again, the sharp returning as she breathed in.

Megan made sure the settings were where she wanted them and then she fired. Kelly closed her eyes, expecting to return to her original height, but was surprised when she felt the familiar sinking feeling again. She opened herr eyes to see Megan growing before her again. She turned her head from side to side to watch her sister's bed stretch out further and urther in all directions.

"Megan!" Kelly yelled up, panicking. "What are you doing?!"

"I'm sorry, sis," Megan replied. "I enjoyed our heart-to-heart. I really did. But if I make you your regular size again, what would stop you from just snatching the gun away from me and then shrinking me down? Or, you would probably tell mom what I did, then I would get in trouble. So, I'm sorry, but I can't grow you back just yet."

Kelly watched as her world continued to grow all around her. Soon, she was less than half her previous height of 13 inches, and still she shrank.

"Um, Megan?" Kelly asked, a little worried. "Just how much smaller are you going to make me?"

"You'll see," Megan responded, in a sing-song voice.

She continued to shrink, going from six inches, down to five, four. Still, it dragged on. Kelly wondered if Megan would ever stop.

Finally, the device shuts off and Kelly looks up a her younger sister. She towered above her like a skyscraper. The vantage point Kelly was provided with made Megan look 70 or 80 stories tall. he had to be no more than an inch tall at this point.

Very carefuly, Megan's thumb and forefingers descended upon her newly shrunken sister. Kelly started running in the opposite direction, hoping to find someplace to hide. But both girls knew it was fruitless, as almost as soon as she started running, Kelly was grabbed by one of her arms and hoisted up towards her larger sister's palm.

She was placed very gently on the wide surface, the palm stretching for a couple of football fields. The fingers, off in the distance, like giant felled redwood trees.

"I'm really sorry, Kelly," Megan whispered, so her older sister's ears wouldn't hurt. "I had to do this. But I promise, I'll take real good care of you. I won't let anybody else harm you. It'sjust until I can figure out what to do with you. Okay?"

Kelly started crying, knowing her life, as she knew it, was over. At least for a while.

Megan placed her shrunken sister back on her nightstand and stood back up. "Stay right here," she said. "I'l be right back."

Kelly looked around, observing what her life had become now. She was now no bigger than a pea, her toddler cousin used her for a squeeze toy, among other things, earlier in the evening. Kelly had ran off to get od knows what. Her life was officially over at this point.

About that time, Megan returned, with whatt appeared to be their old bird cage. It had been cleaned, but it still had rusty bars and the smell of musty bird seed.

"This is your new home!" Megan said, excitedly. She reached over and gently picked her smaller sister up by the arm again and, after sticking her hand into the door of the cage, placed Kelly on the floor of the cage.

Megan removed her hand and locked the door aferwards and peered inside, the enormous face of hers beaming from ear to ear.

"So, how do you like it?" Megan asked.

Kelly looked upwards. The cage stretched like a three-story mansion from her viewpoint She also noticed the bars were just the right size, if she ever thought about escaping.

Kelly smiled back, "I love it."

_______________________________________________________

Later that night...

Kelly couldn't sleep, and not just because her new bed consisted of an empty matchbox stuffed with cotton and a blanket from one of Megan's dollhouses.

She sat up and saw her younger sister asleep. If she was going to escape, this was the chance.

Kelly weighed her options. If she decided to escape now, she would probably be stuck at her current size for a long time, possibly forever. Of course, she could always get the attention of one of her parents and tell them what happened, given they wouldn't mistakre her for a bug.

On the other hand, if she stayed where she was, Kelly would probably be well taken care of. Well-fed, given exercise. I mean, sure, her education would take a severe nosedive; she probably couldn't attend college, given Megan chose to keep her this size forever. But it would be a very comfortable life.

What should Kelly do?
122111222111212.title: Kelly the pet

choices: In Sarah's diaper
In Sarah's mouth
12211122211122.content: Kelly came to and save I giant blue eye staring down at her. Kelly jumped in shock and then heard a loud cacopany of a giggle. Kelly's eyes whiped around and saw that she was even smaller then before (about 1 inch). "I thought this size would be a bit more fun for playing" Megan said. "Sarah put your new dolly in a safe place while we go outside and play." Megan ran over to the door to let Kelly and Sarach out. Kelly loked up into Sarah's innocent eyes, thining of all the safe places Kelly could go and she knew it was not good.
12211122211122.title: Sara

choices: The gun fires and Kelly shrinks again.
Megan is interupted by something.
122111222112.content:
Megan's moment of triumph was cut short as the door swung open. Her mother and aunt entered the house both carrying a bag of groceries. Megan thinking quickly grabbed Kelly and stuffed her into one of her pockets. Kelly struggles to escape, but her but she didn't have the stamina to continue. Her little tussle with Megan really wore her out.

"Megan where is your sister?" her mother asked, "Were you watching your cousin all by yourself?" Megan thought a really quick lie about how Kelly had to go do something important, and how she watched Sara by herself. Of course both her mother and aunt believed every word of it. Meanwhile Kelly struggled to get free of her sister. Needless to say she didn't have the strength to escape, and just succeeded to wear herself out even more.

"Well I'm going to take my toys upstairs now!" Megan says as she climbs the stairs in her own bedroom. Locking the door behind her and set Kelly on the floor and sat down next to her. Kelly was more then ready to try and fight Megan again, but she realized that her size and fatigue put her at a serious disadvantage.

"So what do you plan to do to me?" Kelly asks her sister. Megan didn't say a word. She simply smiled a devilish grin and withdraws the Reducer form her pocket and began to mess with the controls. Kelly knew what was coming next and she didn't want to stick around. Pure instinct told Kelly to run away, even though she knew is was fruitless she made a mad dash for the locked door. She could hear the gun powering up just as she reached the door.

1221112221121.content:
Kelly feels the shrink ray hit her in the back, and she slowly dwindles down, reaching 6", then 5", 4" - the carpet gets really difficult to walk through - 3", 2" and finally ending up at 1".

Kelly stands waist deep in the carpet fibers, when suddenly a dark shadow appears over her. She turns and looks up to find her giant little sister grinning evilly down at her. Megan's giant hand reaches down, and pinches Kelly between her thumb and forefinger. She brings Kelly to her face.

"You know Kelly, I really enjoyed having you under foot just now! Maybe we should make it more permanent!"

"What? What do you mean?" panicked Kelly

Megan kicked off her ratty old Nike sneakers, and peeled off her sweaty socks. She brought them to her nose, and took a sniff

"Phew! These really stink little one!" grinned Megan "Hope you enjoy them!"

With that, Megan dropped Kelly into the damp, smelly sock. Kelly slid down the sweaty fabric, until she reached the moist toe section. The scent of her sisters smelly feet was strongest here. She tried to stand, but it was impossible to find stable footing in the dangling fabric prison. She suddenly felt herself, and the sock, being lowered, and looked up, to see her giant sisters face smiling into the sock opening.

"As you felt so good earlier, I think I'm going to keep you under my soft, smooth feet all day! Won't that be neat!" With that, Megan lowered the sock to her foot, and slowly slide her foot into the sock. Kelly screamed as Megan's giant sweaty toes slowly approached her. There was nothing Kelly could do, she was trapped against the side of the smelly, damp prison, as the giant sweaty toes of her little sister approached her, soon covering her, and pressing her into the fabric.

Megan adjusted her tiny sister, so Kelly was led flat under Megan's sweaty toes. Megan wriggles her toes, relishing the feeling of having her 'big' sister under her smelly toes. Kelly wriggles and squirmed, trying to push the giant toes off her, but they were too big. She hated the feeling of the sweaty, slick toes sliding over her tiny naked body, covering her with her little sister's foot sweat. She could taste it, as the sweat covered her face.

Megan grabbed her Nike's and slipper her feet back inside. For Kelly, the light suddenly went out, and the strong musky scent of her sisters feet just intensified. It also started getting warm!

Megan decided to...

"You see, I am the big sister now, you do not want to anger me. "Stop Megan, that hurts! Why are you acting like this?" Megan laughs and pulls out the reducer.





Considering a little longer Megan having yet to try or figure out what "Enlarge" does shocks Kelly by adjusting the Reducer and setting the power to max.

"Let's see what this does. I'm sure Sara will help me learn this thing"

Sara held the trigger longer than Kelly had earlier.
Nothing seemed to be happening so Megan finally let go of trigger.


"Hey why isn't it working?" Complained Megan.

She tried again however this time the results were the same except the reducer running out of juice and indicating a 3 hour recharge was needed.


"Well darn that was a waste" defeated Megan took Kelly to Kelly's own room foolishly leaving the reducer behind in the same room as Sara.


Moments after they left something began to happen to Sara.
The toddler was beginning to grow giggling at the strange new feeling of growth and cause her young mind viewed her changing perspective as a "game"



Bigger and bigger Sara was growing

1221112222221.content:
Bigger and bigger Sara was growing .
Her growth wasn't super fast nor super slow yet visibly enough to be noticeable were anyone present.



What seemed to be happening fast was actually taking a fair amount of time to transpire.



Sara sat in her playpen rocking back and forth giggling at the feelings and sensations of growing as well her changing perspective on her child's mind being a game.


At 6 feet tall and growing the toddler was running out of space in the playpen.
Minutes later at 8 feet tall wood and plastic started to bend and creak.


Her legs slid between the bars. Suddenly wood splintered and plastic snapped. The growing girl fell a few barely noticeable inches at her size the combination crib slash playpen in ruins.



The 10 foot tot took a happy moment of notice
"Oooo"
For Sara this was a rare experience she was now free of her confines. Fortunately her nursery was an unusually exceptionally large room, still it was a good thing the tyke decided to go for a crawl.


As Sara crawled her way across the carpet little did she know her body was creating static electricity that was mixing with the mysterious energy her growth generated.



As she crawled across the room still growing a coffee table and a few toys met their end.
Sara 12 feet tall and still growing stopped a moment after her hand flattened another toy.


Sara who not unlike some children had a habit of putting things in their mouth picked up the busted and shrinking by her perspective toy.


"Mmm candy yumm yum snacky"
said the unaware toddler.


With that the slightly hungry growing girl tossed the toy in her mouth and swallowed what once would have been a choking hazard.



13 feet tall and satisfied for the moment the growing tyke resumed her slow crawl across the large room.



Every so often Sara would flatten a toy or another piece of furniture with her growing body or stop at a bookshelf once bigger than her and knock it over.



Downstairs 2 floors below Megan who was still messing with Kelly was as blissfully ignorant to the situation above as Kelly. Neither had a clue what had transpired in the last 25 minutes and was still going on.



The 15 foot and still growing toddler soon found the diaper bag left by her parents. Inside she found a box of treats for kids her age and ate it. Next she found a sippy cup full of formula. She chugged it then let out a burp.



Tossing aside the bag she resumed her crawl.
Once more toys met their end under the growing toddler as Sara slowly crawled across the room. Bigger and bigger Sara swelled.



A few minutes later her growth was finally starting to slow. The growing toddler had reached the other side of the room now 18 ft tall and counting.


Sara opened the door with ease but noticed a problem... sort of.

"Aww dwer too small"


Her growth slowing it was too little too late the 19 ft tall girl would not fit.
Sara closed the door then noticed the dresser next to it which she was now bigger than as her growth finally stopped leaving her 20 ft tall.


What caught the tykes attention tho was the reducer or as Sara saw it
"Oooo Shiny toy"


She grabbed it off the dresser. The moment she had the static electricity and mysterious growth energy combination built up around herself was channeled into the device which had been slowly self recharging.


The device was instantly fully recharged and then some. The toddler then began to play with the "toy"



In her playing Sara accidentally adjusts something and then moments later accidentally zaps herself

"Safe toy"


Finally Megan and Kelly decided it was time to check on cousin Sara. They went upstairs.
Once they got there Megan tried to open the nursery door.


"Hey it won't open"

122112.content:
Kelly opened the door just in time to be struck with the beam. As the world grew around her she saw her little sister firing the gun at her.
"Megan, hey stop!" She cried.
Kelly soon found herself smaller than her 8-year-old sister and still shrinking. Megan let go of the trigger when Kelly was about the same size as a Barbie doll. Kelly looked around and made sure her clothes shrank with her.
"Megan, make me big again now!" Kelly demanded.
Megan pocketed the gun and stood in front of her tiny sister.
"Kelly, you're so tiny!" The second grader giggled.
She bent down and picked up her shrunken sister.
"Hey, no, Megan put ME DOWN!" Kelly said.
Megan giggled at her tiny sister's demand.
"You look just like one of my Barbie dolls!" She said, brushing her sister's blond hair.
"No, Megan I'm not a doll! I'm your big sister!" Kelly pleaded.
Megan ignored her sister's pleas and headed off to her room. Kelly held on to her sister's fist, trying not to get dizy. Megan opened the door to her room, entered and shut the door. It was your typical 8-year-old girl's room. Pink nearly everywhere, a nice Barbie doll collection and dollhouse, babydolls and some stuffed animals.
"You never wanna play Barbies with me, Kelly, but now you can! You'll be the best Barbie ever!" She said.
Megan noticed her babydolls as she sat in front of the dollhouse with Kelly in hand.
"Hey, I bet you'd make a good babydoll too!" Megan giggled.

Kelly sighed...

What next?

Megan didn't waste anytime to begin playing. With her older sister the size of a doll, she pretty much could do whatever she wanted.

"Let play house." Megan said still holding her sister in her hand. Kelly couldn't argue with her sister's choice, well she could but she realized it was useless. She was at the mercy of her younger sister not just because of the size difference, but because Megan currently had the gun in her possession. Of course maybe she'll return her to normal size after, the game was done.

"I'll play but after we're done you have too turn me back okay?" she said trying to strike a deal with her sister. Not only was it demeaning but it was also humiliating Megan nodded in agreement before setting the shrunken teen on the floor next to her doll house.

"Go inside." Megan ordered as she pushed her sister forward. Kelly walked inside the plastic house; she was a bit surprised to find that the plastic furniture looked very convincing. Megan was watching her from the the outside of the house.

"What exactly am I supposed to do?" Kelly asked her sister. Megan took a minute to think if house was what she still wanted to play?

"What are you doing?" Kelly said trying to fend off her sister’s hand. She watched as she was striped of her clothing and re-dressed in a different outfit. This would continue until about an hour later when Megan was starting to get bored.

"This is boring!" Megan said as she finished putting on Kelly's 12th shirt. Kelly meanwhile was aching from the way she was just handled.

"You’re going to un-shrink me right?" Kelly asked her younger sister. Megan was about to reply when another voice interrupted her.

"Megan your school bus is here!" Kelly's Mother yells from downstairs. Megan the sighed, and she put her shoes on. She was about to head out her room when Kelly ran up to her and grabbed her leg.

"What about me?" Kelly said trying to remind Megan of the whole shrinking thing? Megan just smiled looking at her doll-sized sister and said:

122112121.content:
Without any warning, (well technically there was a brief warning) Megan grabs Kelly and gently places her sister inside her backpack, she zips it up, and then she heads outside her room. Inside the backpack was surprisingly clean and fresh smelling. Kelly could see a few books and an empty lunch box.

"Megan let me out of here!" Kelly yelled, "You're going to get in so much trouble." however her voice didn't really carry far, so she was trapped, and she waited and waited. During the time she could hear the various sounds of the outside world. Megan stopped in the kitchen to get her lunch. Kelly watched as Megan's hands came in and removed the box.

"Mom!" Kelly said while Megan casually took the box out of her bag, packed the lunch inside, and placed it back in the bag. Kelly's mother was in the other room, which meant that Kelly's screams went unheard. Megan re-zipped her bag and walked into the living room where her mother was.

“Megan before you go have you seen your sister this morning?” Kelly’s mother asked. Kelly started to kick and scream for help.

“Yes! She’s in here.” Megan said holding up the backpack. Kelly’s mother thought she could hear, muffled sounds coming from the backpack but just blamed it on her imagination. Kelly stopped kicking and screaming, realizing she couldn’t get the attention of anyone outside the backpack.

As Megan heads out the door, Kelly reminisces about her grade school experience, as it would seem she was going back at least for today. Megan steps on the school bus and...

As Megan steps on the bus Kelly can hear the sounds of the bus moving and children talking. She doesn't even attempt to yell or scream because if it didn't work in her own quiet house what are the chances it would work on a buss full of yelling kids? Megan instantly sees her friend Anne sitting on the bus in the third row and takes a seat next to her. Anne notices that Megan is unusually excited this morning.

"Why are you so happy today Megan?" Anne asks as soon a Megan sits down. Megan without much hesitation unzips her backpack and reaches inside and pulls the shrunken Kelly out, and shows her to Anne.

"Look what happened to my sister!" Megan said holding out Kelly like she were a new toy or something. Anne at first didn't understand what Megan meant buy ..."my sister!" but when she recognized it to be Kelly she gave out a slight gasp. Kelly meanwhile was trying to balance on her younger sister's palm.

"Megan... how, why?" were the only word's to come out of Anne's mouth. Megan moved her closer to Anne before she spoke.

"I found this toy that can make things little." Megan said as she pulled out the reducer with her free hand. Kelly tried to grab the gun off of her sister but she was too tiny to reach it, and if she did it was to big for her to operate anyway. Kelly falls about twenty feet from her perspective and lands on the lap of her sister's friend. Anne is wearing a dress and Kelly starts to sink into the gap between her legs. "Oh, she is so small Megan," says Anne. Kelly gets a grip on Anne's dress and starts climbing up her. Kelly climbs up the inside of Anne's left leg and reaches the top. Kelly looks up at the two giant girls and starts to get dizzy. She walks up Anne's thigh then falls forward onto her stomach. The two girls break into laughter. Kelly has a lot of anxiety building and just lays where she is at. Anne feels warm so Kelly snuggles up against her. "Wow, it looks like you have a new friend Anne," teases Megan.

Anne smiles down at Kelly and strokes her back softly with her finger tip. Kelly enjoys the petting and starts to feel a little better. "I have always wanted a little sister Megan, can I keep her?" "Sorry Anne, this is my little sister, I shrunk her first," replies Megan. "Oh poo, she is so adorable. I would love to dress her in my dolls' clothes," says Anne. Just then, the bus starts to slow down as it pulls up in front of the school. It comes to a stop and kids start to file off. "Megan, can I keep her just for a part of the day?" Megan stops to think, then looks down at her shrunken sister. The girls have to stand up so Anne picks up Kelly carefully in her hands and gets up. Anne brings Kelly up to her face and gives her a big kiss, "you are just the cutest doll ever!" Kelly is not sure if she likes the compliment, but really hopes Anne helps her get big again. The students walk onto campus and head toward their classroom. Megan and Anne have the same teacher, but sit on opposite sides of the room. The girls then go out to the playground for a little while.

The bell rings and all the students line up by their classroom. Kelly is feeling very sick from all the movement of Anne. She ran around in the field, played on a couple toys, and then went on the swings to top it off. Their teacher Mrs. Flores opens the door and lets everyone in. After a few minutes, the students settle down and find their seats. Mrs. Flores begins talking about what is going to happen today. Kelly is down in the bottom of Anne's pocket. She is happy that Anne is finally sitting down. After a few minutes of everything being calm, Anne opens up her pocket and looks down at her doll. "Hi Kelly," Anne says softly. Anne is attempting to listen to her teacher while she slowly reaches into her pocket and pulls out Kelly. She lifts her out and keeps her under her desk so the teacher can't see. Anne's chubby fingers prod Kelly's body as she is rolled around in the giant girl's hands. "Wow, my dolly is so soft. I have never felt one like this before," Anne thinks to herself. Anne's fingers slide all over Kelly's body, even under her shirt. "Anne, stop this! Put me down!" Kelly yells up to her captor, but there is no response. Kelly is really not happy with what Anne is doing, but is does feel good. Next,
122112121122.title: Third Grade

choices: Kim (show that brat whose boss!)
Ms. Flores (Teach her that she's in charge!)
1221121211222.content:
At this point, Anne has started to remove kelly's top. "Hey, what the hell are you doing!" shouts Kelly. "I just want to get a look at why you teenagers are so concerned with how you look." whispers Anne so Ms. Flores dpesn't hear her.

"Well, stop!" insists Kelly. Anne does a slight shake of her head and continues to remove Kelly's clothing. Once Kelly is fully nude, Anne raises her hand. "Yes, Anne?" asks Ms. Flores. "Can I throw some paper away?" replies Anne. "May I. Not can I." insists Flores. "Oh, may I throw some paper away?" asks Anne for a second time. "Yes you may." Anne waddles to the front of the room and discards Kellys clothing into the trash can.

"That outfit cost 70 dollars!" Kelly screamed. Once Anne was seated, she responded. "Don't worry, It lost all of it's value once it was made for a mouse anyways." Anne giggled. "You don't seem to look all that great, what's the purpose of having these bumps anyways?" Anne says as she strokes Kelly's breasts.

Kelly bats Anne's pudgy fingers away, then bites her thumb. "OW!" Anne shouts outloud. The whole class and Mrs. Flores turn their attention on Anne. "Oops, sorry, stabbed myself with my pen, hehe." Ms. Flores notices a small pale object in Anne's hand. "Anne, what do you have in your hand?" she asks.

"What? Oh, nothing." Anne says nervously. "Oh really?" "Yeah, really."

Ms. Flores makes an "yeah right" type of face then makes a motion with her finger telling Anne to come over. Anne gets up and, while doing so, deposits Kelly in her left pocket. "Oof!" Kelly yells.

Anne gets to the front of the class. "Now, Anne, show the class what you've got." Ms. Flores demands. Anne merely shakes her head. "Show the class, Now." Ms. Flores says with a hint of anger.

Anne reaches into her left pocket and pulls out the tiny nude teenage girl.

"What is that? A doll?" says one student, Jane, mockingly. "Haha, Anne plays with dolls!" mocks another, Kim. The classroom bursts into laughter as Anne hides her face in shame. She then yells, "It's not a doll! It's a shrunken girl!", furiously.

The class is silent for a moment. Then the laughter erupts once again. "Have a seat, Anne." says Ms. Flores, pitying the girl. Anne walks with her head down back to her seat. She stops paying attention to Kelly throughout the whole period.

Once the bell rings, Anne meets up with Megan in the hallway. "Hey Anne, how are you enjoying my sister?" asks Megan with a smile. Anne doesn't answer the question. "Hey come talk to me outside." says Anne. "Alright, I guess." responds Megan.

Once they get outside, they sit under a tree and begin to chat. "Hey, Megan. Would you let me borrow your toy gun for a while?" asks Anne. "Uh...NO. It's kind of an important trinket. I can't just go letting anyone use it." replies Megan. "But...I need to get revenge on a few girls in my class...Please?"

"Hmm...alright but only until tonight. You can take Kelly with you. Bring her home by 6." says Megan. "Oh thank you, Megan!" says Anne.

Inside Anne's pocket, Kelly pops her head out. "Woah! What? Megan, You need to bring me home and return me to normal! NOW!" she yells. "Kelly, Anne is your new big sister for the rest of the day. Behave for her and I might make you normal again." replies Megan. Kelly crosses her arms and mutters to herself.

"Oh...Anne?" "Yes, Megan?" "Why is my sister naked?" "Just wanted to do some inspecting." "Hmm..alright see ya."

Anne takes Kelly and the Reducer back into school and to her next period. Once school is over, Anne decides to enacrt her plan for revenge. "Make fun of me, will you!?" thinks Anne outloud. She has three people she intends to get revenge on.

First, she intends to shrink Kim. Kim is an asian girl with long black hair in a ponytail. She has been held back three years so she is actually 12 years old. She has recently hit puberty and has developed pretty quickly. She is 5'1.

Second, she wants to show her teacher whose boss. Ms. Jessica Flores is a 22 year old woman who has just recently gotten out of college. She has short brown hair and is drop dead gorgeous. Anne is curious as to how her "bumps" differ from Kelly's. She is 5'8 (with high heels).

And lastly, she wishes to shrink down Jane. Jane has been Anne's rival since the beggining of 3rd grade. She, like Kim, has been held back 3 years and often makes fun of Anne for her lack of "assets". Jane is quite pretty for her age, has long brown hair that's kept in a ponytail, and is short for her age at only 4'2.

So, she has her hitlist...who does she go after first? (leaving Jane for last)

"Ugh...where are we going?" aks Kelly from Anne's pocket.
1221121211222.title: Anne's Hitlist

choices: Anne bends down and grabs the tiny teacher
Anne leaves the teacher there to face another class
12211212112222.content:
"You'll see." Anne responded as she pat the pocket in which Kelly had been stored. Kelly grunted in annoyance and began to yell, but Anne had stopped paying attention. She had decided to take revenge on Mrs. Flores.
"She'll see who's REALLY in charge..." Anne muttered as she strode down the thin hallway. She passed many other innocent children laughing, playing games, and chatting; all of them were completely unaware of the power which Anne held in her hands.

Anne forced a fake smile onto her face as she turned the long silver doorknob to enter Mrs. Flores's room. Mrs. Flores heard the rattling ofr the knob and glanced at the portal to her room.
"Ahh... Anne." She said, her smile quickly becoming a grimace. "Sit down, I want to talk to you about earlier."
"Yes Mrs. Flores..." Anne said with mock disappointment. She pulled back a chair on the opposite side of Mrs. Flores's desk and lowered herself into it. Her innocent look masked her dark intentions. Mrs. Flores leaned her elbows against the desk and clasped her hands together.
"Anne, you shouldn't lie to the class like that. It's not very nice." Mrs. Flores wagged her finger at Anne with this line.
"But Mrs. Flores, it really IS a little girl! I swear!" Mrs. Flores began to lose her patience.
"Young lady, stop it. You can't expect me to believe that you have a shrunken teenage girl in your pocket." She said sternly, through gritted teeth.
"Fine. I'll show you." Anne jeered. She quickly removed the gun from her pocket and fired it at Mrs. Flores. She began to shrink rapidly, and within 3 seconds she was lying on the ground in front of her chair, 3 inches tall.
Mrs. Flores wearily lifted herself up using her arms and shook her head rapidly, as if to awaken herself from a deep sleep. She felt the cold linoleum beneath her hands and became puzzled. She tilted her head upwards and gasped in horror.
She saw a huge pair of feet, dressed in black, single strap velcro flip flops staring at her. The skin of the feet was slightly tan and the feet themselves were long and thin. She gazed up at a pair of thin legs attached to the feet before stopping at the bottom of the desk. She heard a loud giggle from above her.
"See? I told you there are shrunken people." Mrs. Flores saw the feet disappear from in front of her. Before she knew it, she turned to her left and saw the humongous face of Anne staring down at her.

What does Anne do?

When those thoughts entered her head she couldn't spare any feeling for Mrs. Flores anymore. Anne simply exits the classroom, slamming the door behind her.
