12311.content:
Suspension and expulsion both sounded like frightening words to Kelly, especially the thought of her parents finding out, but she could not hand over her new found device so soon no matter what the cost. And this teacher...they wouldn't know what happened to her, not if she cleaned up the mess. All of this is flowing through her mind at once in a matter of twenty seconds, while Professor Fields stared intently at her. And at last....
"Miss Middleton. I do not tolerate being ignored, not at home and not at work, especially not from a student who can't follow a simple request. Hand it over, or else I'll have you out of here and on the phone with your parents before you know what went where. Now how does that sound."
Kelly was still a little slow with it, but she did understand that she was being scolded, and she did not like being scolded much....
"That sounds great. I'm not much for speeches but that was actually pretty good.
I don't think I'm giving this to you though...."
"Here, allow me to show how serious I am". Fields swiftly clasped Kelly by the hair, pulling it up, forcing her to wince in pain. "Excuse me if I seem blunt. I don't respond well to back talk miss Middleton. Do you honestly believe that I come to work everyday to hear this from you? I asked you one thing, one simple task as simple as taking a breath of air, and this is how you respond?" Field's grip was getting tighter and tighter around Kelly's hair.
"L-let GO! I..it hurts...!" Kelly writhed out.
"Listen to me carefully miss Middleton: Hand over the toy". As she said this she pulled Kelly's hair back so far that her nose was in the air. Her eyes were red and they began to tear.
"You..b-bitch...". The words carefully fumbled from Kelly's mouthe.
"What did you say?! Did I hear you right!" The professor was fire red in the face, she was using all her might to cause all sorts of pain in Kelly's head now.
"Th-th-that was the l-last mistake...y-you'll ever..make..". said kelly with a tremor in her voice. Miss Fields instinctively glanced down at the hand that held the device, and watched in some what disbelief as it was so intently pointed at her body. She was unable to think of what kind of damage it could do. Kelly must be bluffing she thought. Fields then gave Kelly a fierce and fearful look into her eyes, as Kelly gave back a satisfied grin. The stood like this for a moment. White light streamed from the strange device in Kelly's left hand, going strait into the torso of Fields. Field's grip began to weaken, and all the air in her body began to lift. A flying-freefall feeling overwhelmed her, and she quickly became disoriented and unable to discern the visual world. It all came back in seconds at a time. What she could tell, was that she was no longer her regular size, and that she was over a hundred feet in the air, still clinging to Kelly's hair.
"WHAT HAVE YOU DONE TO ME!?!?" Her little voice screached. Kelly reached behind her head, enveloped her hand around the professor and brought her to face level, the warm air from her mouthe surrounding the tiny teacher like hot water turning into vapor. Utter fear and complete bewilderness was all that could be read on the teacher's face.
Kelly began to wisper "I could so easily kill you, in a thousand ways....." Excitment and adrenaline began to run through Kelly's veins at the power she had over her once dominant professor. Evil and sinister thoughts began to flood her mind.
"PLEASE PLEASE I BEG YOU!!! DON'T DO THIS PLEASE!!! I'LL DO ANYTHING!!!!
Fields voice could just be heard to Kelly's ears. She was sympathetic towards, seeing as how she was still human. The power she held, on the other hand, wouldn't kill to exercised or demonstrated for once. Or would it....

choices: Kelly dishes out some well earned payback from years of being bullied.
Kelly qucikly attempts to return Angela to normal.
12321.content:
Angela smiled as she turned and walked away, she was probably heading off to tell someone about this whole mess. With anger clouding her judgment Kelly aimed the gun at Angela's back. Angela whose back was turned by the whole event never saw what was about to happen to her. Kelly pulled the trigger and the gun lit up, followed by a strange echoing she watched as the Angela dwindles right in front of her eyes.

"Angela!" she yelled out confused by the whole thing. The tiny read head hadn't even noticed what had happened to her. Kelly took another look at the gun. She was amazed that she had a real life shrinking device in her hand. Angela meanwhile had just turned around to see who called out her name. When she turned she noticed that Kelly was huge, she panicked like crazy wondering what had happened to her when she remembered the gun Kelly was holding.

"You did this to me didn't you?" Angela yelled, her voice was very high high-pitched to Kelly's ears. Kelly still dazzled by the whole shrinking process, ignored Angela's outburst. Kelly just looked down at the tiny red hair girl with, so many things running through her mind.
12321.title: Tiny Angela

Leave her in the hallway to fend for herself.
123211.content:
"Did you hear me you freak?" Angela with her eyes filled with anger. Kelly heard this and quickly reached down for with her hand. Angela ran as fast as she could, but the size and speed of Kelly's hand overwhelmed her. She was immediately snatched up by Kelly's hand, which showed how weak she was since Kelly isn't very dexterous.

"Even after all this, you're still making fun of me?" she said obviously angry. Angela fought her hardest to escape, but she was far too small and weak to break free. It was then that she truly realized who was in charge of the situation, it was Kelly not her.

"Listen! Just return me to normal and I'll promise to never mess with you again." Angela said attempting anything to be let free. Now Kelly was naive but anyone with a IQ of 4 could see she was lying through her teeth.

"I don't believe you." Kelly said sternly, as she squeezed her hand tightly. This caused Angela to scream out in a pain. "You'll just pick on some other person after you get me expelled. Someone should teach you a lesson!"

Kelly thought maybe a whole day of being shrunk might change her ways. Of course what steps could she take to administer such a punishment?

The helpless Angela, still struggled to break free of Kelly's grip, but with very little effort on her part Kelly continued to hold the tiny teen.

"Listen, I have to go to class if you want I can leave you here to get stepped on by someone else." she explained putting emphasis on the word leave. That when Angela gasped, she knew she wouldn't survive in the hall way.

"Fine I won’t try and fight you." Angela muttered as she crossed her arms. Kelly couldn't help but giggle; she accomplished what most teachers had tried for years. She made Angela Gwen to listen to someone other than herself.

"Good girl!" she said patting Angela on the head like she would her dog. "If you behave, I'll return you to normal after school." Enraged by that action Angela was about to throw out every swear word in the dictionary. Ready to head to her next class Kelly walked down the halls and headed for her ______ class.

Fill in the blank:

12321112.content:
Kelly finished getting her book need for History class and then looked at the little bully in he hand. With a small grin, she set Angela into her left pants pocket.

"Now be good and don't make a sound, got it?" Kelly said, speaking like she was talking to a child, not a shrunken teenager.

Angela just rolled her eyes, but nodded non the less. Kelly grin just grow from this action. She then placed the reducer into her bag, so she wouldn't loose it.

As she walked the short distance to her class, she couldn't help but look at her former enemy. It gave her a strange sense of power, seeing Angela so small. It also made her think of all she could do with this wondrous device she had found.

When she had made it History, her teacher, Mister Brown had asked why she was late. She made up a story that her dog had gotten away from her during his walk. The teacher believed her, but stall needed to write her up. Kelly thanked him and took her usual seat in the middle of roll of desk.

No sooner then did she sat down, then did she feel something against the back of her head. She snapped her head around and looked at a certain red head.

Mandy Bridges was someone Kelly changed Angela's pack, one of a group of four who always follow Angela around. They talk, dress and act a lot like their leader. And such, they love to annoy Kelly to no end.

But Mandy was one of the less brighter of the group, resulting to premature stunts such as spit balls during class. Kelly usually just forget about her and try to focus on class. She did a quick check on Angela and an idea suddenly popped into her head. She had shrunken the leader, so why not the rest?

'Hmm, that doesn't sound like such a bad idea.' Kelly thought. 'But how?'
12321112.title: History class, new Idea?

choices: Does she shrink them?
Does one of the girl see her?
123211122.content:
Kelly knew from personal experience that everyone in Angela's pack had a smoking problem. One of the teachers had caught the pack when they were skipping gym class to have a quick lit. Kelly had the bad luck to be around when they were caught and as such, she was force to take the blame.

Kelly frown as that little memory appeared in her mind. It seems whenever Angela or her pack were late for something or in danger of being caught, they could sweet talk themselves out of it. Even the most stern of teachers found themselves nothing more then pools of water when the pack was around.

It was decided then and there that she was going to shrink the pack when they were together. All she had to do was waited for the end of class. Kelly knew that after every class the pack sneak out of the building to have a quick smoke behind the school.

So, she had the endure the boring talks of the teacher and the constant spit balls to the back of her head. Every once in a while, she would look at her catch and was surprise to find that Angela was taking a nap. Like the entire shrinking thing wasn't bother her anymore. That just made her a little mad.

Finally the bell rang and everyone instantly bolted for the door. Kelly kept herself out of Mandy's eyesight as she followed her to the secret meeting place of the pack. Sure enough the entire group was there, having a smoke, even without their leader.

Kelly kept to the shadows in true ninja looked fashion as she spied on the smoking girls. She check on Angela, hoping she wasn't planning on anything else. But she found her still sleeping. Again this anger her slightly, but decide to wait for now.

She took out the reducer and looked it over. She found out there was more to this thing just just a reduce and enlarge features. She found a power setting and sizing setting as well. Looking at settings, she learned the device was set for 85 power output and five inches tall. A wicked grin formed on her face as she set the 50 output and took aim...
123211122.title: Target: Angela's Pack.

choices: Should she play with them?
Should she leave their leader and watched from the shadow?
1232111221.content:
Kelly quickly fired on all four of them and then waited for the show to start. At first she didn't notice any difference. But as she continued to watch, she notice something odd. They were indeed shrinking, but at a slow rate, but that wasn't what was odd. The odd thing was, that the item they were smoking wasn't shrinking with them, despite the fact that their clothes were.

Kelly watched, waiting for the time when her prey would realize what's happening to them. She carefully looked at each girl, taking of how all of them were.

Beside Mandy was Heather, a senior in high school, with short blond hair and green eyes. Though it was her last year, she liked hanging with the pack for some reason. Kelly had always believe it was because Angela was holding something over her.

Next there was Rose, with shoulder length deep red hair and brown eyes. She was youngest among the entire pack, just barely 15. Kelly thinks the only reason why she hangs out with them is because she wants to look cool.

Finally there was Brandy, with black hair that reached to the center of her back, kept in a ponytail and with red eyes. She was a senior, like Heather, but unlike Heather, she was just as snobby as Angela. Kelly thought the only reason was Brandy hangs out with Angela was to try and knocked her off her high horse.

Suddenly the bell rang, but no one, not even Kelly paid attention to it. In this short time, they had shrunk to nearly have their normal size and still they haven't notice how large their smoking items were. Five minutes passed and there were about two, three inches and still shrinking.

"Is it's just me or do this weed look like bigger?" Mandy asked in air-headed way.

"It's just you," Brandy replied angrily.

Another five minutes passed and there were nearly a foot even. within 2 1/2 minutes and there were finally five inches tall, same as their leader. Kelly then decided too...
1232111221.title: The shrinking Pack.

choices: Should she play with the device?
Should she play with the girls?
12321112211.content:
Putting on a big grin, Kelly stood out from her hiding place and walked up to the four, five inches tall girls. They all looked up at the giant, but were to high to realized what was going on. Before they could say a work, she had scooped them all up and placed them in her pocket, with their leader. The action had woke the slumbering Angela up. Kelly was surprise that all her moving around didn't wake her sooner. Angela begin chewing out her pack for disturbing her beautiful sleep. Again, Kelly was slightly anger that her first shrunken victim wasn't to nervous about this whole thing.

Kelly hurried into the school, careful to avoid the hall guard. She had decided to skip the rest of her classes for the day and "play" with her new toys. She quickly and quietly made her way through the school. Luckily she new this place like the back of her hand, so it was fairly easy for her to make her way to the second floor and then to the exit that would lead her to the roof. She scanned the area quickly and then hurried unto the roof.

Once there, she made her around around the exit and saw her own little hiding spot. Since no one come to the roof, she had brought a folding tray table and a lawn chair up there a few years ago. This was the place her safe house when the packs' teasing was to much for her to bear.

She took out the shrunken pack and gently set them on the tray table as she took a seat. Almost immediately the five shrunken school girls begin gossiping among themselves, paying no attention to the giant in front them. Again this made Kelly anger as she listened into their mindless talk of dresses and stuff like that. So, feeling like she didn't need to hold anything in anymore, she decided too...
12321112211.title: A Pack on the roof.

choices: To return them to five inches?
To returned only Heather, Rose and Mandy to normal?
123211122111.content:
Too take her mind off of the senseless talk between the pack, she took out the reducer and began testing it.

After a couple of minutes, she learned a few things about this little device. She learned that when set to reduce, it couldn't shrink things beyond an inch. When set on enlarge, it would only make things as big as 50 feet. A wicked smile appeared on her face as an idea formed into her mind.

Turning the device to reduce, she set the setting for two inches and highest power. She then aim at Angela and Brandy and fired. Instantly the two snob were smaller then their friends.

Kelly then turned it to enlarge and set it to eight inches. She fired it at Rose and watched her grow. Finally, she set it for 12 inches and fired it on Heather. She left the air-head Mandy at five inches, thinking it was prefect size for her.

"What the hell happened?" the two, 2-inches girl screamed in surprise and anger.

Kelly giggle when she heard how small the two snobs sounded.

"I don't know, but I think I liked it," Heather said, looking angrily down at the two smaller girls.

"Hey! Don't get any ideas, I maybe small, but I'm still in charge!" Angela stated boldly.

"Really?" Heather then did something truly unexpected. She grabbed Angela and dropped her pants.

"What are you doing?" an embarrassed Angela asked.

"Something that should have been done years ago," Heather replied.

She then begin spanking the two inch high girl. Kelly begin laughing like a crazy person as she watched this little act.

"Ouch!! Stop it!! Ouch!!! I said spot it!!!" But her demands fell onto deaf ears as Heather continue with her much need revenge.

This want on for another five minutes, finally ending with Angela in tears She then promise to be good girl for now on. After all that was said and done, Kelly was still giggling, happy to see that Angela was listening. Rose how watched this entire things and decided it was better to not get in the way of the taller, shrunken girl.

"Now, how about returning us to normal?" Heather asked kindly.

Kelly then decided...
123211122111.title: Spanking the Brat.

choices: Kelly agrees and they all grow to 50 feet tall
Kelly disagrees and only she grows to 50 feet tall
1232111221112.content:
Kelly thought about returning all three of them to normal; Heather, Rose, and Mandy that is, but then thought that Mandy would just go back to immature acts and smoking the most out of the group.

"Heather, Rose, if I return you to your normal heights do you promise to do something for me." Kelly said. "Sure, what is it?" Heather asked, after she and Rose had officially dismissed themselves from Angela's pack.

"I don't want either of you two to bully again. Unless it's dealing with those two." Kelly said firstly. "And the second thing is to lessen your smoking."

"I've actually been trying to stay away from that stuff." Rose said. "The weed Angela made us buy did some crazy stuff to us."

"I can do both those things all well." Heather said.

"Alright then." Kelly said, setting the Reducer to Enlarging Mode, and returned both Heather and Rose to their original heights.

"Hey! What about me?!" Mandy yelled up.

"I know you, like Angela you'd lie straight through your teeth and go back to bullying and smoking. These two I can actually trust." Kelly said.

"Hey, since there is three of us, and three of them, why don't we just get rid of the bothers now?" Rose asked.

"Don't tell me what you mean what I think you mean, do you mean to eat them?" Heather asked.

"I think she does, and honestly, I'm fully okay with that." Kelly said.

Kelly snatched up Angela, Rose snatched up Mandy, and Heather simply grabbed Brandy.

"1...2...3." Kelly counted, before all three of them let the tiny girls slip from their hands, and onto their open tongues.

Angela, Brandy, and Mandy all slid down the girls' throats, all terrified to hell.

Mandy beat on Rose's insides when she reached her stomach, but that only made her burp, digesting Mandy all the faster. Brandy panicked in Heather's stomach, as she had claustrophobia, and the stomach was a very tight space, and digested very slowly, making her suffer all the more. Angela was in Kelly's stomach, and was a mix of both Brandy and Mandy's emotions, she digested speedily, but that was only because she was trying to scoot around to avoid death.

"Hey, that wasn't that bad actually." Heather said.

"Speak for yourself, Angela tasted like she didn't shower or shave for days." Kelly said, getting a drink of water from her water bottle, trying to drown out the dirty taste.

"Mandy felt good in there, she beat on my stomach until she digested." Rose said.

"So Kelly, what do you plan to do with the Reducer?" Heather asked.

"Yeah, I've been wondering now that we've gotten rid of all the pests." Rose said.

"Well, I always wanted to be fifty feet tall." Kelly said.

"Would you let your two best friends join in?" Heather asked.

"Yeah, could we join in as well?" Rose asked.
1232111221112.title: Brand New Friends, Two Even!

choices: Operation rescue "The Pack"
Operation Run & Hide
Call 911
1232111222.content:
Liv was not happy. She'd run out of her favorite brand of smokes again. She really needed to keep better track of how much she had left. Thankfully that weird kid with all the pimples could get you anything you wanted for the right price. The blonde couldn't be more pleased that he had her favorite brand, 'noire'. Black ciggs that burn red.

While most people would say the brand was ass, she would say otherwise. Now that she'd secured her favorite out of school activity supplies, she could join her girls for a much needed smoke. Right as she made her way to the back of the school, a bizarre sound caught her ears.

She carefully poked her head around the corner to see her girls... Shrinking!? Her eyes bulged and she began to wonder if she'd somehow gotten high off Angela's supply again even though she hadn't seen her around today. Her body began to tremble as she instinctively put a 'noire' in her mouth.

She would've tried to walk over but an ominous whistling cut through the air. From the other side of the school came that girl she and the pack liked to mess with, Kelly, Liv thought her name was. She whistling ominously while waving some strange device in her hand. If her eyes weren't deceiving her it looked like a gun.

Why was she carrying around a gun!? Then she casually strolled up to her girls and scooped them up. She did this to them she realized. That girl must've shrunk them with that weird gun. It was the only answer that made sense. Liv watched in fear as Kelly dumped her girls into a pack.

Once she was done she stared to look around as Live cowered behind the wall of the school. After a minute or two, Kelly mumbled something under her breath before walking off. She might've missed one member of the pack, but that didn't mean she couldn't find her later. Liv Summers was next on her list.

After some time, Liv poked her head around the corner and saw the girl and her friends were gone. Without realizing it she had shakily lifted her gun lighter to her lips and lit her 'noire'. The nicotine did nothing for her as she slid down the wall and took a deep puff. That girl was out to get them. Get her.

If she hadn't run out of 'noires' then she'd be joining her friends in a bag. Her friends! She had to save them! She could call 911 and... No! They would think she's crazy. No one would believe her. Still, she had to save them. The pack had done so much for her.

She had to do something.

Liv knew that would be the end of it.
They enter into physical struggle

Who was hit?

1232111222221.title: Grow

choices: Shrink Kelly down to size
Regrow "The Pack"
More options
12321112222211.content:
Kelly was beyond excited. She'd finally gotten the last member of Angela's pack. As soon as she had Liv she would have a complete set. Right as she was about to start gloating at the teary-eyed blonde's misfortune, Kelly noticed something was off.

Her original plan was to shrink the girl and scooper her up. So why was it that said girl was getting bigger!? Liv should be shrinking not growing! Liv seemed to notice this too, her crying ceased and she looked down at herself to see the ground moving further away. How could this be? She'd been hit. Should she be bug sized... or something?

Kelly was getting kind of sacred now. This wasn't right. How big would Liv get? Kelly looked down at her gun and noticed some of the dials had been moved around in the scuffle. Their brief exchange had set the ray to grow. This was bad. Who know what Liv would do to her if she was bigger?

Kelly began to sweat before regaining her composure. She could fix this. She still had the gun after all. All she had to do was flip the dials and shrink Liv down to size. Her plan could still work. Or maybe she could flip the script and make herself bigger. That also sounded quite appealing.

Right before she could make a decision however, she felt a hand slap her across the face, forcing her to drop the size-gun. Before Kelly could even recover she felt the stinging pain of the hand that left a large red imprint on the side of her face. She looked up to see Liv had finally stopped growing and was now taller than she'd ever seen her.

Liv was normally 5'5" but it appears the ray had grew her to a staggering 10' feet tall. Not only that, she was now holding the size gun! Kelly felt ill. This wasn't right. This was supposed to be her revenge against her tormentors. She was supposed to be the one in control for once. How could this have happened!?

"Now Liv... let's not do anything you'll regre--"

"My friends! Now!" Live interrupted harshly.

She didn't need to tell Kelly twice as the geek girl hastily dropped the ''Mini Pack'' onto the ground. Kelly did a quick mental count to see all her friends accounted for. They were too small for her to hear at her current size along with the rapid winds that seemed to be picking up. The mini group wasted no time running over to Liv's side.

"There's all you're friends, safe and accounted for. You're gonna let me go now, right? No harm no foul." Kelly pleaded.

Liv thought about Kelly's words. She was only begging for mercy now because she didn't have the advantage anymore. She wasn't really sorry, just scared. Even though the pack had messed with her often they had never put her in a life threatening situation. The moment Kelly had power she didn't hesitate to them in one. This girl was clearly deranged.

If Liv could hear Angela right now she'd hear the sound of her shrunken leader begging her to shrink the nerd down to size she could have a crack at her. A sentiment the rest of the mini group shared. Liv still unaware of this stared Kelly down with a glare that would frighten even the bravest of souls.

She was just so helpless. Groveling on the ground like the pathetic bug she was. It was disgusting. To test a man's character you give him power, and Liv had a clear understanding of Kelly as a person. The question was, was she even worth punishing?

Liv grows herself more

123212.content:
"This could get me into big trouble..", thought Kelly. "If anyone see this..". Then she turned the dial to 90%, aimed at the tiny creature at her feet, fired, and Angela was almost normal again, about 5 feet, so she was now shorter then Kelly(5'6"), even in the 5" heeled boots.

Kelly was still in the shock of the whole thing, and just looked the redhead in front of her, who was shorter then her. Then suddenly Angela reached for the gun, grabbed it, and set it to 75%. Kelly woke up looking at the gun pointed at her. She saw a bright light, and the world began to expand around her. She looked at the 15 year old amazon in awe, who had a wicked smile on her face.
When the shrinking stopped, she was eye-level with her breasts.

"Hmm... I think I'm going to like this little thing.." said Angela, and looked at the gun.
"10 seconds to recharge. If I were you, I would be running... " And she pointed the gun again at the small girl. Kelly turned and began to run.

But which way?

1232121.content:
"To the Principal's office... She can help me against this little bitch."
And she run forward, to the other end of the hallway. She heard the knocking sound of the boots, and the evil laugh of the redhead, so she runned as fast as she can. But when she was almast at her goal, she heard a beep.
"You stupid bitch! You tought you can get away from me?"
And again, she felt the dwindling feeling, but she kept running. When the shrinking stopped, she was only 1'5" high and stand by the door. She looked up, and saw, that she couldn't reach the doorknob. She was stucked in the hallway, and the only exit from here was where she came from. She looked back and saw Angela walking in her way with that wicked smile on her face.
The redhead slowly approached the tiny blonde, who didn't even reached her knee. She tapped with her foot on the hard floor and the whole hallway was echoing. She was waiting for the gun to recharge, and finish this little game.
Kelly had to think fast: Should she escape, and risk to get captured again, only in a smaller statue, or should she surrender, and wait here for her fate, maybe Angela wont be mean.
1232121.title: End of the road

12321211.content:
Angela wasn't nice, Kelly already knew this, and having a omni powerful weapon wasn't going to make her any nicer. So she ran she ran fast, Angela didn't make any attempt to stop her, because she knew Kelly couldn't escape.

"You can't get away just you wait!" Angela said while she waited for the gun to recharge. Kelly just reached the end of the hallway when she heard that dreaded beep. She didn't even turn back she already knew it was coming. It seem like she just blinked, and she suddenly found herself even smaller than before. The change in size made her fall over.

"This isn't good." she said. In the distance she could hear loud foot steps drawing closer. Before Kelly could even get up another defining sound echoed through the halls. A new period was starting, and all the other students made their ways down the halls. Kelly watched as giant sandals, flip-flops and tennis shoes all marched down the hall. Without much thought she jumped up off the ground and ran in the opposite direction of all the students.

"This is a nightmare." she thought while looking away from the direction she was running. All was going good until, she ran smack into the shoes of another person. When she fell down she took one look at the giant person she collided with, she instantly recognized who it was but she was too dazed to say anything and that's all she remembered before she went completely unconscious.

But who was the person who saw?

123212111.content:
Kelly wakes up after being unconscious. She opens her eyes to be face to face with her worst enemy. "Ha, thought you could get away didn't you." Angela voice boomed through the air. Kelly couldn't say any thing all she knew is that she has a really bad headache. She looks around and notice that she's in the girls bathroom.

"Look at ya, you look even more pathetic now than you did before." said Angela. Kelly wanted to say something but can't quiet get her thoughts together. It was just hard to think with a bad headache.

Angela opens her purse and drops Kelly in. "I'll just keep you in here until I figure out what to do with you." She said as she zips her purse shut. Kelly is now in the dark. There's nothing she can do but wait and see what her fate was going to be.

Just before Angela left the bathroom, the door opens and in comes Danielle one of Angela best friends. Danielle has short dark brown hair and is a little bit taller then Angela. "Hi Angela, do you want to skip the rest of the day?" " Sure, lets go." Angela reply.


Were do they go?

On the way out of the school, Angela explained to Danielle about the gun and how it could shrink things. Danielle didn't believe her at first, but Angela showed her a little demonstration on one off the school's security guards.

Meanwhile Kelly was still in Angela's purse, trying to recover her composure. However the rocking back and forth didn't help her headache at all.

"Let’s go to the mall and hang out." she heard Angela say from outside of the purse. Kelly couldn't really hear it to well but it sounds like Angela was with someone else. Another person just meant more trouble when Angela was ready to take Kelly out of her purse.

"She'll probably kill me." Kelly thought. About a half-hour later her head started to clear up, and she was feeling better. By then Angela and Danielle had just entered the mall, ready to do whatever they wanted to do. From inside the bag Kelly patiently waited for Angela to open the purse, since she couldn't escape. Just then almost immediately Kelly heard a loud sound.

But what was it?

Angela gives up, and Kelly somehow escapes unnoticed.

The purse slowly unzipped and Angela's fingers slowly came dropped into the bag. Kelly took the time to hide underneath some of the other items in the purse. She could hear Angela talking from above.

"Where is that tiny dweeb?" Angela said while she began sorting through her stuff, "I think she got away." Kelly was hiding underneath a make-up kit which was a pretty good spot since it was underneath so many other items. She could hear Angela tearing through the purse. Will she be found or if not will she escape her prison?

choices: "Sure.  Keep her.  Whatever."

123212111111.content:
Angela's giant hand came closer and closer, knocking things aside like a bulldozer until, finally, her tree sized fingers felt something soft and fleshy cowering at the very bottom of her purse.

Kelly gasped as she heard Angela say far above her, "Ah, here she is." The hand wrapped itself around her tiny, 3 inch form and the frightened teen was pulled out of the purse, Danielle's face going wide with shock.

"Oh my God. You weren't kidding, were you?" the dark haired giant said, bringing her massive head closer to Kelly, until the shrunken girl could feel the other woman's breath washing over her. "This is so cool! Hey, isn't she that Kelly loser from school?"

"That's her," Angela replied, taking a sip from her Coke with her other hand.

"I thought it was. We have the same History class, I think."

In a dangerous voice, the giantess warned, "Try to escape from us, try to run away and get help somehow and I promise I'll shrink you so small that even an ant won't be able to seee you. Understand?" "Sarah!? My god! What happened to you!?" Tom faked.

The response was immediate as Sarah sobs momentarily ceased. She looked to the side with surprised eyes to see her boyfriend. "Tom?"

Before he could even react her giant hand scooped him up and hugged him close to her still dripping and enlarged bosom. Her skin was soft and moist and momentarily distracted you from your guilt.

"Tom! I'm so glad to see you." Sarah cried.

"It's good to see you too. But seriously, what happened to you? You're a giant." Tom acted.

Sarah held him up to her face and explained her situation. One minute she was normal and went for a swim and the next she was giantess that couldn't even fit in her own home.

Tom's guilt returned but he swallowed it down hard. His mother once told him hell hath no fury like a woman scorned. If she knew the truth, she'd flatten him. Now that he thought about it his siter would too if she knew what he did.

"What am I going to do Tom? What if I'm stuck like this forever?" Sarah worried. Tom's guilt returned. "I'm a freak!"

"Don't say that!" Tom snapped, surprising Sarah and even himself. "You are not a freak. You are the most beautiful girl in the whole damn world. You are the biggest, strongest, and most special person in my life and you are amazing."

Sarah seemed stunned by his impassioned speech and Tom couldn't believe something so earnest came from his lying mouth. Sarah really was special to him and maybe he could turn this situation around without revealing the truth.

Before he could say anything else he found himself enveloped by a pair of giant pink lips. It was the biggest and wettest kiss she'd ever given him. "Thank you Tom, I really needed to hear that."

"Don't mention it." Tom smiled. "Besides, you could turn this situation in your favor."

"How?" Sarah asked.

"How? Just lookat you. You can do whatever you want and nobody could stop you. You. Are. A. Goddess!"

"A goddess?" she whispered.

"Taht's right." Tom confirmed. "So let's go into town and have some fun. The world is your playground."

Sarah processed what Tom was saying and a small smile creeped across her face which in tern made Tom smile. He was right, she could put her new stature to good use and do whatever she wanted. She was a... Goddess.

Tom decided Kelly had had enough experimenting upon, as he had proven the gun works quite well. He also thought that Biscuit was so big he could easily destroy the house or stable unintentionally.

"Hey! Kelly," Tom called out as he walked toward her. "I don't know what happened. One minute Biscuit and I were the same height going out for a ride, the next he's as big as the house and I'm half his size, and I can't figure out why," Kelly immediately said. "I promise I won't break or hurt anything, but I don't think I could stop Biscuit if something spooks him."

"That's actually why I came here," Tom admitted. "You see, I found this gun, and I wanted to know what it did. When I saw you were preparing to go on a ride, I thought that was the perfect opportunity to try it out, and that's why you and Biscuit are in this…predicament."

"Nice of you to ask," Kelly replied. "I don't suppose you could help get us back to normal, or is it one way only?"

"As a matter of fact, I was just coming over to do that, now just hold still for a minute." Fiddling with the gun to set it to shrink mode, Tom started by shrinking Biscuit. Down he went, from house sized, to Kelly's height, and finally down to his normal size. Next up was Kelly, and she was soon shrunk back, too.

"That's better," she said. "Being tall is nice and all, but not when you're too big to fit inside your house. I think you've had enough fun with your toy, so as a reward for being your first test subject, you should give me the gun and let me use it for what I want now."

131312211.content:
"I guess you're right," Tom conceded. Somewhat reluctantly, he handed Kelly the gun.

"Thank you very much. Unlike when you had this, I won't be making anything building sized," she said upon receiving the gun. Next, she went over to Biscuit to take off his saddle and stuff.

"Biscuit's a little short, don't ya think?" she said, and promptly fired at the horse, causing him to grow a foot and a half. "And I need to be able to see eye to eye with him," she continued, now using the gun on herself and matching Biscuit's height. "See this? This is how to responsibly use the thing."

"Alright, I get it. I might not have been thinking about the consequences earlier, but you don't need to keep reminding me," Tom answered.

"Just want to make sure you've learned your lesson. Now, let's go see if we can find April and May"

April and May were their twin younger sisters, 11 years old. They were identical except for one thing: their hair wasn't the same color. April had blonde hair, while May's was a light shade of brown. Otherwise, the two were exactly the same and almost inseparable. They had cheerful personalities, and were well-liked by most people they knew.

"Hold on, you're not seriously going to use the gun on them, are you?"

"Well, if you can stalk your sister and make them taller without them knowing it, so can I," Kelly shot back. "If it means anything to you, I promise to keep the small enough to fit in the house and large enough to not get stepped on by anybody."

Tom shut up after that, and let Kelly do what she wanted without questioning her. Kelly walked through the house looking for the twins, and inside found a note from her parents that said they'd be gone for a couple days, and that she and Tom were in charge while they were gone. This gave Kelly plenty of time to use the gun for her purposes, and there was a lot to do.

Kelly was looking out her window when she found the twins in the front, playing on the tire swing that was set up in the biggest tree near the house. April was on the swing and May was pushing her, both seemed to be enjoying themselves. Kelly took aim at May, checking the gun to make sure it would grow her younger sister. She then fired at May, who quickly shot up in response.

Noticing that were now two major differences between them, May stopped pushing the swing, and April got out to see what was wrong. By the time Kelly took her finger off the trigger, April eyes were level with her twin's stomach. As they marveled at May's sudden growth spurt, Kelly fired at April, growing her until she was the same height as May. Even though Kelly had grown herself some, she was sure that the twins would have at least a head on her if they were measured side to side.

The twins appeared to be overjoyed at their fortune, completely unaware of who or what caused them to grow. They didn't seem to be too keen on finding out that cause, either, and were content to compare themselves to things that they used to look up at. After getting tired of that, they agreed on something and started walking towards the house.

"Tom! Kelly! You're never going to believe what happened to us today," one of the twins yelled as they ran inside the house in search of their siblings.

"Kelly, its amazing! April and I were just out front playing on the swing when suddenly-OW!" May's story got interrupted as she hit her head on the door frame running into Kelly's room. April wasn't far behind, but she ducked under the door, laughing at her sister's misfortune.

"What she's trying to say is just got a lot taller for no reason and now we want to show you," April finished for May. "Speaking of things to show, what's that you got there," she added, referring to the gun still in Kelly's hands.

"This? It's a really cool toy I found that can do some really cool stuff. Like this," she said as she used it to grow May, who had recovered from hitting the door, until her head was touching the 9 foot ceiling. "Or this," she said as she shrunk April until she was barely up to her twin's waist.

"Does that mean you did this to us?" May asked, towering over her older sister. Kelly nodded while April whined, "I don't wanna be short, I wanna be tall like May is!"

"I'll let you two be big if you promise to be good, otherwise you're gonna stay short like you were when you woke up. Got it?"

Upon hearing "Yeah!" in unison, Kelly grew April up to the ceiling, then gave herself a smaller boost, now 7 and a half feet tall.

"I'm hungry. I'm gonna get some food," April anounced.

"Me too," May said as she followed her sister to the kitchen.

When Kelly got to the kitchen; she found the twins staring at a plate of cookies, looking glum. "What's wrong," she asked them.

"We wanted cookies, but we didn't realize they would be so tiny. I could eat all of these in, like, two bites," April complained.

"I think I know what to do, just don't touch the cookies for a minute," Kelly said. Aiming at the plate of cookies and making sure that the gun was set to grow, Kelly shot at the cookies. The twins watched in amazaement as the cookies and the plate grew and grew, until they were all 3 feet in diameter or more.

"Yay! You're the best, Kelly," they exclaimed, then set to work on the cookies. Even with giant cookies, the twins made short work of their snack. They then looked to Kelly eagerly as they told her what they wanted to do next.

13131221122.content:
The twins stared down at Kelly with their best puppy dog eyes, hoping that they could convince her to grow them. Kelly, however, was not giving in.

"Absolutely not," she said. "You two are big enough right now, and if you get any bigger you're just gonna cause a lot more trouble than it'll be worth." Despite being a full foot and a half shorter than the twins, Kelly knew they wouldn't try to argue with her about it. As she expected, the twins deflated when they heard their sister's denial.

"Aw, you're no fun," May complained. She and April gave up on the puppy dog eyes and had now switched to pouting, but Kelly wasn't changing her mind anytime soon.

"I know you think this is all a game, but this thing's not a toy," Kelly said, gesturing to the gun in her hands. "We barely know what this thing does or how dangerous it is. And since we don't know anything about it, it's not a good idea to keep messing around with it. I'm not going to shrink you back to normal, so why don't you go do something somewhere else?"

The twins thought it over for a second, shared a glance, then came to a silent agreement. "Ok, we understand," April said. "Thanks for letting us stay big." With that, she leaned over and gave her older sister a hug, moving aside to allow May to do the same. Although they were outwardly accepting that they weren't going to be able to convince Kelly to make them any bigger, the twins had decided that they were still going to find a way to get their hands on the gun, it was just going to take a little more patience than they first expected.

As the twins headed out the door, Kelly sighed, reflecting on how crazy the day had already been. She was distracted from her thoughts by her phone ringing, a call from her best friend Jennifer. Answering the phone, she quickly got absorbed into the conversation and went to her room, forgetting the gun on the kitchen table in the process.

Outside, April and May were going over their game plan to get the gun back. They decided that after pretending to play outside for a while, April would go inside to find the gun. If Kelly asked what she was doing, April would lie and say she had to go to the bathroom. Once she found the gun, she would take it to the bathroom and toss it out the window to a waiting May, and then they would get free reign to use the gun as they saw fit.

When they decided it was time to put their plan into motion, April walked into the house and nearly started laughing out loud at how easy her mission was. Luckily for her, she kept quiet just in case Kelly was nearby, and quickly took the gun back outside to a waiting May.

"It was too easy, Kelly just left it on the table," April explained to her twin.

"Awesome, that means we can get to using it even faster," May replied. "Since you went and got it, I'll make you bigger first, then you do me."

Amy passed the gun to May, who took a second to look at it to try to figure out what everything did. The design made it look like a sci-fi ray gun, with a switch on the side that had two options, "Grow" and "Shrink". Since the gun was already set to grow, all May had to do was point and shoot.

"How big do you wanna get?" she asked April

"Make me big enough to look over the house, that would be so cool," the other twin responded.

"You got it. Get ready!" May called out as she began to fire. Instantly, a beam shot out and hit April square in the chest, and not long after that she began to rise. Steadily, April could see her perspective getting higher and higher. Within seconds, she was tall enough to look into the second story windows on the house, and shortly after that she had to bend down to see into them. After less than a minute, April's head poked out over the top of the house, and she gave a thumbs up to May to signal her to stop.

"How's the weather up there?" May called up to her now gigantic twin. Despite being nine feet tall herself, she felt absolutely dwarfed by her sister.

"It's great! You should come on up now," April answered, and May needed no further invitation. Turning the gun on herself, May pulled the trigger, rising to meet her twin. As she got closer to April's height, she had an idea. Instead of matching her sister, she was going to outgrow her. Not by a ton, but enough that it would be easily noticeable between the two of them. Upon matching April's height, she held down the trigger a little longer, until she was about half a head taller than her.

April quickly noticed the difference. "Hey, that's not fair!" she cried at the injustice of being the smaller twin again.

"That's what you get for going second," May said back.

"Give me that," April said, lunging for the gun. She and May struggled for it, and in that struggle, the gun accidentally fired again. A shadow fell over April as the target of the blast grew.

1313122112221.content:
May looked down at her sister and mulled over her options. She could leave April at her current height and remain the undisputed tallest. She could even shrink her all the way down to normal. However, neither of those two really appealed to her since she never held a grudge towards her twin. With her mind made up, she pointed the gun at April and fired, watching as she rose up to meet May's height. Instead of stopping when they were equal, May kept growing April until the latter was a whole head taller than the former.

"Thank you!" April said as she wrapped her sister up in a bear hug. "But why did you make me so much bigger?"

"I thought you might wanna be the bigger one of us for longer than a minute," May told her. "Besides, I have an idea for something really fun we can do." She paused as April raised an eyebrow at her. "You shrink me and I'm gonna go back inside and get our swimming suits. Then we can go swimming in the lake as giants! Doesn't that sound fun?"

April's eyes lit up at May's suggestion. There was a secluded lake a ways from their house that only their family ever went to. Swimming in the lake was one of the twins' favorite things to do when they were normal sized. At their current sizes, who knows what amazing adventures could be had?

"Great idea! Give me the gun and I'll shrink you." May passed her the gun, which expanded a little to match April's larger hands. April checked to make sure it was set to shrink, then fired at May. She watched as her sister dwindled in size until she saw May give her a thumbs up, then she released the trigger.

From May's perspective, everything had become much larger. Looking at the house on one side of her, then over to April on the other side, she realized just how huge they had made themselves with the gun. The house, which she estimated was around 30 feet tall at the roof's peak, wasn't even half as tall as her sister. May herself was only a little bit taller than April's shoes, on account of April shrinking May almost down to her original size.

Snapping back out of her thoughts, May waved to her sister as she started walking into the house. "Be right back! Don't go anywhere!" she teased, which made April giggle. Inside the house, May didn't see either of her older siblings. When she passed by Kelly's room, she could hear her older sister was still on the phone, so she was still too distracted to notice anything that was going on outside. "Oh, Mom." Lisa Donaldson sighed as she retrieved a package adressed to her from the mail room. "I thought I told you to stop sending me stuff! Oh, well... what goodies did send away this time?"

As a college junior, Lisa had been away from home for about three years. By now, she was pretty used to it, but apparently her mom wasn't; despite her protests, her mother insisted on constantly sending her money, home cooking, snacks, advice, and other helpful pieces of motherly love. Lisa didn't mind it during her freshman year, which was of course a pretty tumultuous time, but now it was starting to feel as though her mother had let empty nest syndrome get the better of her. She had tried to talk to her mother, to tell her that she was a big girl now and insisting that she stop sending away packages every week or so, yet her mother persisted in sending her more and more stuff.

"Well, as long as she sent it..." Lisa thought. A part of her actually liked receiving the gifts on a regular basis: her mom was a great cook, and being a flat broke college student, she wasn't inclined to refuse some extra cash.

To her surprise, when she finally returned to her room and opened up the brown box, it contained nothing but a strange device and a note. "Wha?" she said, picking up the note and reading it, hoping to gather a clue as to why her mother sent her this. Sadly, the note didn't help much. It simply read "Found this lying around in your room and figured it was yours. Love you! Mom."

Putting aside the note, Lisa picked up the device and examined it. Amid the complex array of lights and circuits on the surface, she was able to make out two rather large blue buttons lying at the center of the strange machine. One was marked with a white plus sign, the other with a white minus sign. Protruding from the device's black body was what appeared a small cannon of some sort.

"Geez. This defintely isn't mine. How the hell did it get in my room, though?" she wondered, looking at it from different angles, as though doing so would give her a better idea of just what the heck it was. "How does this thing work, what does it do? I'd try it out, but... maybe it's dangerous..."
