Just as Lisa was prepared to give up hope, thunderous footsteps echoed from outside of her room. She watched as the doorknob--to her hundreds of feet in the air--turned, and the incredible door pushed open.

Only two people would come into Lisa's room without knocking. One was Danica, her roommate, because it was her room as well. The other was...

"Hey, Lis! Just poppin' in to say hi!"

The other was Julie, her sorority sister.

Lisa couldn't help but stare up at the massive girl who walked in her dorm room door. Julie was normally about five-six, just a little bit taller than her petite friend, with nice curves and a sweet face. The giant who now walked into her room was hundreds of feet tall, her tennis shoes the size of small warehouses. Towering legs disappeared into a crimped white skirt, and her pink blazer bulged with breasts that seemed large enough to affect the tides. When Julie moved a hand to brush some of her blonde hair out of her face, it was as if the skies themselves were moving.

Lisa was transfixed. With every step Julie took, her entire world shook. Julie had always been nothing but Lisa's kind of dopey friend, a little air-headed but always nice. Now, she looked like a massive, sexy Godzilla.

"Lisa? Are you in here, hon? I thought we could go grab something to eat..."

Her friend's booming voice snapped Lisa out of her reverie. She hopped up and down on the device, waving her hands in the air. "JULIE! JULIE, IT'S ME!" she screamed at the top of her lungs. The mammoth Julie stepped right near her, affording Lisa an incredible, IMAX-sized view of her white thong underwear. She hopped and screamed her tiny little heart out, desperate to be heard...
1412.title: Sky-High Sorority Sister

choices: ...in Julie's dorm room
...in the school science lab
14121.content:
"Hey, what's that noise?" Julie wonders aloud. She looks down at her feet, backing away a bit.

"IT'S ME!" Lisa screams. "JULIE, IT'S ME! HELP ME!"

"That sounds like--OH MY GOD!" Julie screams. She drops down on all fours, moving in close to the device and her tiny friend. "Lis, is that you? Oh my God, you're so little!"

"I'm shrunk!" Lisa yells, relieved that her friend is close. "This machine did it! You've got to--"

But Julie isn't listening; she's looking around frantically. "Oh, no, this isn't good, Lis! You're all teeny-tiny and you're helpless in here and your room is locked and oh my God I've got to get you somewhere safe!"

"JUST PUSH THE BUTTON!" Lisa yells. "PUSH THE--"

But it's too late; Julie has already gently rolled the girl into her hand. Little Lisa rolls to the center, totally disoriented as her new perch suddenly rises hundreds of feet in the air at incredible speed. She orients herself just in time to find Julie looking around again, the device in her other hand.

"Sorry, hon, but I've got to get you somewhere safe!" she cries. "I don't have my purse with me, so I guess this'll have to do! I'll be careful!"

Lisa tries to protest, but the motion of Julie's hand is too disorienting. Before she even knows what's coming, Lisa feels the hand tipping over, and the tiny girl screams as she goes sliding downward, out of the hand, and into...

"Sorry!" Julie says. "It'll have to do for now! I have to hide you and protect you!"

Lisa gasps. She's taken aback by her location. "JULIE, I'M IN YOUR DAMN--"

But the tiny girl can't finish before Julie shoves her down further, thrusting her into the depths of her cleavage.

At first, Lisa tries to struggle, clawing at the massive mounds of flesh in an effort to free herself. Of course, that doesn't work; she's simply too small, and Julie's breasts--impressive at normal size--are now the size of small hills. So instead, she simply settles back, falling into the warmth and softness of her good friend's chest. Lisa never dared tell a soul, but she had always had a bit of a crush on Julie, admiring her lovely body when the two tried on clothes or went swimming. So rather than fight further, she instead opts to enjoy the ride, burying herself deep in the sensual pillows of the woman she'd secretly loved, knowing full well she'd never have such an opportunity again.

Before long, however, the ride was over, and tiny Lisa felt a hand scoop her out. When Lisa looked around, she was...
14121.title: A Friend in Need is a Friend in Cleavage

choices: Lisa tries desperate measures to get Julie's attention
Julie has an idea for how to rescue her friend
141211.content:
"Well, here we are!" Julie says enthusiastically.

Lisa looks around--at the bunk bed, at the pink sofa, at the big-screen TV and the two computer desks and the wardrobes, all stretched to mammoth proportions. "WHY ARE WE IN YOUR DORM?" she shouts.

"Yeah, sorry about that," Julie says sheepishly. "I kind of panicked and didn't know where to take you? So I grabbed that think next to you 'cause it, like, looked important, and I decided to take you hear because it's totally safe!" With a nervous grin, Julie sets the tiny Lisa down on the carpeted floor, the normally thin fibers curling around Lisa's ankles. She stays hunched over, smiling down at her friend. "You sure are tiny, though! How did that happen?"

Lisa shrugs. "IT'S THAT MACHINE!" she shouts. "IT CAN MAKE PEOPLE SMALLER! I HIT THE MINUS BUTTON AND IT MADE ME LITTLE LIKE THIS! I BET IF WE--"

"Right, okay, good!" Julie says. "So if we hit the minus button again, that should reverse it, right?" She aims the device down at her friend.

"WAIT! NO! JULIE! WHAT ARE YOU--" Lisa shrieks.

"Here goes nothing!" Julie shouts as she presses the minus button.

The flash of white light that surrounds Lisa feels terrifyingly familiar. The carpet fibers that were curled around her ankles suddenly begin growing upward like mammoth plants, swallowing her whole. She screams at the top of her lungs, but it seems more pointless than ever. When the light fades, she opens her eyes to find carpet fibers the size of trees stretching overhead. The ridged plastic surface beneath the carpet looks to her like a thatching of thick wooden planks. Crumbs and dust specks that would have otherwise been invisible to her tower nearby like boulders. And overhead, filling the sky beyond the carpet fibers, is the face of her best friend. Lisa gasps at the sight--Julie is larger than any mountain she has ever seen!

"OH MY GOD!" Julie screams, her booming voice forcing the minuscule Lisa to cover her ears. "LISA! LISA, ARE YOU OKAY, HON? OH MY GOD, I THINK I SHRANK HER OUT OF EXISTENCE!"

"I'm here!" Lisa shouts back, waving her arms in the air. "Julie, I'm right in front of you! You're looking right at me!"

But it was no use. Julie was just too big... or, rather, Lisa was just too small. She was bug-sized compared to her previous bug size, and she knew that she was now so small that no one could ever see or hear her again.
141211.title: Julie Screws Up

choices: Try to go to Julie's eye
Try to go to Julie's ear
1412111.content:
Lisa takes stock of her tiny size one more time, noting with disgust an ant crawling at a thankfully large distance. The insect is, to her horror, about the size of a large van. While Julie could probably see her, how could she pick her out? She was nothing more than a speck now.

Before Lisa could start to cry, she steeled herself. She could stay tiny on the floor forever... or she could do something about it.

With a sprinting start, Lisa leaped onto one of the carpet fibers, marveling for just a moment at how the fiber barely moved at the touch of her tiny body. Luckily, at her size, the strand was full of crevices where she could put her hands and feet--weighing practically nothing at all, she felt like she was floating to the top. Once above the carpet, she jumped up and down on the fiber, waving her arms in the air.

"JULIE!" she screamed. "JULIE, I'M DOWN HERE! CAN'T YOU SEE ME?"

Julie was, indeed, looking right at her, but to Julie's warehouse-sized eye, the tiny Lisa didn't even register. No, she'd have to do something else instead. Luckily, at that moment, something else swung by, and with a quick leap, Lisa grabbed hold of a strand of Julie's blonde hair.

"Oh, shit, this was a bad idea, this was a bad idea," Lisa muttered, clinging to the hair for dear life as Julie flung her head back and forth, sending her hair flying to and fro. To Julie, it was a simple head movement, but with every turn, Lisa was flung back and forth like a swing the size of a small mountain. Every time she had a moment to rest, Lisa marveled at the sheer scale of her friend--even her hair, which was about eight inches long, stretched for hundreds of feet above her. Even her barest movements felt like huge earthquakes. Julie was nothing less than a force of nature at this size, and she was also Lisa's only hope for survival.

Soon, Julie rose to her full height. It seemed that she was moving toward her desk, looking for something. Lisa ambled quickly up the strand of hair, her path helped by microscopic imperfections that Julie couldn't possibly see and would not have been happy to know about. She had to get Julie's attention, but how? There seemed to be two options...
1412111.title: Hair-Raising

choices: Julie puts Lisa down and grows her back
Julie grows Lisa back immediately
14121112.content:
Lisa made her choice. Julie might blink her eye, or she might simply not see the nearly invisible woman clinging to a hair in front of her, or any number of involuntary things might go wrong. Inside Julie's ear, though, she could take her time, get her attention, and work her way around. Either way was a long shot, but the ear seemed a little bit safer.

Luckily, as Julie swung her head to the right, the strand of hair on which Lisa was clinging flung towards the ear. When the hair settled, Lisa saw an enormous golden surface--dozens of feet long--just beneath her. It was Julie's auricle ring, a shiny path that would lead right to the inside of her ear! With a sigh, Lisa made the leap, landing on the ring with scarcely any force at all. Once again, Lisa was in awe at how little she seemed to weigh; the ring didn't move at all at her weight, and even as she stood up on it, she found it as wide as a huge highway.

Before Lisa could even take a single step, though, Julie moved her head again, and all at once, the ground beneath Lisa's feet began to tilt! The tiny girl shrieked in terror as she slid down the ring, flying into the air. Lisa was on the verge of tears, realizing how stupid she was to think she could interact with the universe at all at her speck-like size.

Then, all at once, she landed, sliding further and further along a slope surface. She screamed again, watching the gargantuan, skyscraper-sized pink wall before her as she slid down the opposite side.

When she reached the bottom, it dawned on her.

She had landed in Julie's ear!

At this size and in this location, the movement of Julie's head wasn't even noticeable; it was on too massive a scale for the tiny Lisa to notice. Slowly and carefully, she walked deeper into the ear canal, past disgusting hills of earwax that loomed almost to her size, into the fleshy tunnel that stretched for hundreds of feet above her head.

She had to be careful, though. If Julie felt her before she heard her, she might scratch her ear, and Lisa could easily be crushed even by the width of her fingernail. Or cut in half. Lisa shuddered and paused, deciding she'd better not venture further after all.

She took a deep breath. Then, she realized that she'd better pitch her voice deeper; at her tiny size, her voice might be too high-pitched for Julie to even hear.

"JULIE!" she called. Her voice echoed through the ear canal.

Suddenly, there was a pause in the movement. "LISA?" a voice called back, so loud that Lisa had to cover her ears. "LISA, I HEAR YOU, HON. WHERE ARE YOU?"

"DON'T MOVE!" Lisa yelled back. "I'M INSIDE YOUR EAR!"

"HOW DID YOU GET IN THERE?" Julie boomed.

"NO TIME TO EXPLAIN!" Lisa called. She coughed--pitching her voice this low was hurting her throat. "PUT YOUR FINGERNAIL NEXT TO YOUR LEFT EAR, JUST TOUCHING THE TOP OF YOUR EAR LOBE. I'M GOING TO CLIMB ONTO IT."

"OH GOD," Julie bellowed. "JUST... BE CAREFUL, OKAY? I DON'T WANT TO HURT MY ITTY-BITTY FRIEND!"

Lisa turned around and saw the fingernail approaching, a hundred feet wide or more. Even the merest tap of the ear caused a ripple that caused the fleshy landscape to shift, and tiny tremors in Julie's movement that would have been invisible at normal size now looked like little earthquakes. Carefully, Lisa maneuvered her way down the ear, then climbed onto the polished red nail. At her tiny size, the streaks from Julie's nail polish were as wide as her entire body.

"OKAY!" Lisa yelled back into the ear, as loud and as deep as she could. "SLOWLY MOVE ME TOWARDS YOUR FACE!"

"HANG ON..." Julie said. Lisa did so, digging her hands into the otherwise microscopic imperfections in the polish, holding on tight. Julie was moving her hand slowly to her, but to Lisa, the nail soared through the sky.

Then, in the distance, it suddenly appeared. White and soaking wet at first, with a layer of moisture terrifyingly visible. Then an enormous field of blue and black, with rods and cones almost the size of Lisa's hand. Cells. Lisa was so small that she could see the cells in Julie's eye. As Lisa stood up, a gargantuan pink wall suddenly collapsed from the sky, and dark strands of thick rope descended with them--a simple blink that reshaped an entire world. Lisa was caught off balance but stood up again, holding her hand up meekly.

"...hi," she said softly. She don't know why she bothered. Julie was beyond enormous. She was incomprehensible, a goddess even. How could she hope to be seen?

~*~


Julie squinted. She knew she had heard the voice, and she'd done just what it said. Had Lisa fallen off? Would she have to find her friend in the carpet again?

Then, all at once, she saw movement. A little flash of color against her nail, like a speck of dust. She moved the nail closer still, and she saw that the speck was waving to her.

It was Lisa. She was no bigger than a grain of salt.

"Holy shit," she whispered, suddenly acutely aware of how loud she had been talking. "Holy shit, hon. We've got to get you big again."
14121112.title: The Faintest Cry

choices: Julie wants to try to find the Reducer
Julie doesn't care--she's too drunk with power
141211122.content:
Lisa could feel Julie's hand shaking as the massive metal remote came into view--from Lisa's perspective, it was massive, the size of a huge hill. She steadied herself on the fingernail as best she could, relieved at last to finally reach her correct size.

...until a thought occurred to her.

"...how's Julie going to hit me at my size?" she said aloud.

And she panicked.

"JULIE! JULIE! YOU HAVE TO STOP!" she screamed, waving her arms in the air and jumping up and down. "DON'T DO IT, JULIE! PUT ME DOWN SOMEWHERE FIRST! OH, GOD, JULIE, YOU HAVE TO STOP!"

~*~


Julie squinted down at her fingernail, aiming the device as carefully as she could. To her relief, her tiny friend seemed to be on her feet, jumping up and down, obviously trying to keep her attention.

"I see you," she whispered. "Don't worry, Lisa, it's almost over."

She placed the device in front of her, staring down the end of it at her friend...

~*~


"JULIE! NO, DAMN IT, I KNOW YOU SEE ME!" Lisa screamed. "LISTEN TO ME! PUT ME BACK IN YOUR EAR! PUT ME--"

But it was too late. A white flash of light overcame her, and a tingling sensation filled her body. At first, it seemed like nothing was happening.

But she knew how it felt to be in the device's power. How could she be staying the same size?

"OH GOD!" Julie suddenly shouted. "SOMETHING'S WRONG! THE MACHINE IS SHRINKING! LET ME TRY AGAIN!"

And then, all at once, Lisa knew exactly what was happening.

"JULIE! NO!" she screamed, her voice nearly growing hoarse. "DON'T PUSH IT--"

The white flash of light came once more.

Julie had pushed it again.

Lisa was growing--there was no doubt about that. And the double-dose of the device would no doubt return her to her full size.

Looking up with horror, though, Lisa could see that she was right. The ceiling was approaching quickly. Julie was panicking. But from Lisa's perspective, the vast fingernail on which she stood wasn't getting any smaller.

Julie had not just enlarged Lisa.

She had blasted herself.

Twice.

Lisa sighed, sitting down on the fingernail, watching as massive chunks of plaster and brick rained down around her, relieved to find that Julie seemed to be shielding her from the debris. "Welp," she said to no one in particular. "Good job, Jules. Nice work."

~*~


A chill ran down Julie's spine as she fired the device. Lisa wasn't getting any bigger; in fact, the device itself was getting smaller! Was it the + button that did it? What was happening?

"Oh God!" she shouted. "Something's wrong! The machine is shrinking! Let me try again!"

Still staring down the end of the device, Julie fired again, her thumb enveloping the button. The white flash happened and... nothing. The knot in her stomach tightened. She could suddenly feel a breeze around her, as if she was being launched upward.

And then she hit the ceiling.

"What in the--" she started to say. The room was getting smaller, too! Everything around her was shrinking! She hunched over to try to stay in the room, but everything seemed to be closing in around her.

Then... she realized what she'd done.

"Oh, shit," she muttered. "We're both getting bigger, aren't we?"

The crunch of her head bursting through the ceiling gave her answer for her. As her eyes rose to the second floor, she saw two other students watching with terror, screaming their heads off as the gigantic Julie burst through their floor, her growth beginning to accelerate.

"Sorry!" Julie called. "You might want to get out of--"

But she was already bursting through to the third floor.

And then she remembered.

"LISA!" she screamed, and she moved her right hand over her left, covering her still-tiny friend up. Had Lisa been blasted, too? Was she getting bigger with her? Where could she put her? What if she put her down and then crushed her in her seemingly unstoppable growth?

Too many thoughts raced through Julie's mind before she burst through the building from all sides, the walls and ceilings crumbling around her. She was outside now, and she could see crowds beneath her, staring up at her with total awe, watching her rise and rise to the clouds.

With her hand still quivering, she moved her left hand to her eye. There, still speck-sized to her, was Lisa, thankfully growing with her.

"I... I need help," she said with a sigh. "You're smarter than me, Lis. Help me." And she moved her fingernail to her ear again.

~*~


"Yeah, you're damn right I'm smarter than you, you enormous bimbo..." Lisa muttered, holding on tightly as the fingernail moved. As she crossed from the fingernail to Julie's ear, she was for the first time aware of how high in the air she was, though at her still-dwindled size it was hard to gauge. What was important, however, was that she was rising very, very quickly. She was growing very, very quickly. Just how big was she going to get now? How big was Julie going to get?

"I'M SORRY, LIS," Julie boomed as Lisa climbed into the ear once more. "I'M GLAD YOU'RE OKAY THOUGH!"

Lisa rolled her eyes. "I'M okay? What about everyone in that building? Why didn't you put me down before growing me back?"

"I'M SORRY, OKAY?" Julie shouted. "I'M NOT USED TO MAGIC SHRINK RAYS OR WHATEVER! I'M A RELIGION MAJOR, FOR GOD'S SAKE!"

With a sigh, Lisa sat down in the ear. Outside, she could see blue skies all around--Julie had obviously outgrown all of the nearby buildings. "Well, there's not a lot we can do except hope somebody finds the device, I guess. Or if there's another one, maybe that'll help." Lisa didn't dare say what she was thinking: that Julie had destroyed their entire dorm building, that there likely wouldn't be any survivors, that the remote was no doubt buried in the debris of the building. Probably destroyed.

She was so lost in these dark thoughts that Julie's next question threw her for a loop.

"SO HOW BIG DO YOU THINK I'M GOING TO GET?"

Lisa paused. She hadn't even pondered the question yet. How could she know?

"Well, we're growing at the same rate," Lisa said. "So that must mean that rate is consistent. I'd estimate I was about an inch tall when the machine shrank me, which would've been 1/62 of my original height. How tall were you, Julie, before..." She trailed off, looking outside. Clouds were zipping past. "...before all this?"

"SIX FEET," Julie said.

Lisa crunched the numbers in her head. She had always been a whiz at math. "Six times sixty-two... times sixty two..."

No. Oh God, she thought.

"D-Divided by... about five thousand..."

~*~


Julie could hardly believe what she was hearing.

Four miles tall.

She couldn't even get her head around it. Four miles! Bigger than any building on Earth! Bigger than almost every mountain on Earth! Lisa was still talking, still rattling off numbers, but even though Julie could hear the terror in her voice, she couldn't make out the words any more.

She'd had her eyes closed for some time--she couldn't bear to watch the world shrink around her--but for the first time in a few minutes, she opened them, trying to find something to compare herself to. The world around her was blue and bright, skies surrounding her from all sides, but the clouds seemed... different. Mostly absent.

Then she looked down. And found the clouds. They were at her chest.

Some of them in the distance were taller than her, and a few wispy ones seemed higher, but for the most part, they were low. And far, far down below her was the town she called home, growing further and further away from her. She felt like she was looking out the window of an airplane, and she remembered feeling like all of the little people had looked like ants when she'd gone up before.

She gasped. They were ants now. She had stopped growing, and their huge cities, their mammoth highways, their vast farms stretched out before her like a map. Picking out individual people was impossible. She could see a football stadium near her right foot--it was only about an inch long. Skyscrapers that had towered over her before now couldn't reach the tops of her toes.

And in the midst of it all, the people. There must have been thousands of them staring up at her now, craning their necks to see past the enormous feet that no doubt covered her entire college campus. Many of them were probably already dead, crushed by her unstoppable growth. She couldn't even hope to move without hurting something--there was no doubt about that--but the remote was probably buried somewhere beneath her huge feet.

Among the rubble.

Among the people.

Among the fearful, the awed, the star-struck...

"Julie? Julie, you okay?" she heard a tiny voice in her ear call out. She was so lost in thought that she forgot that she'd taken one of the tiny humans with her: her best friend and sorority sister, Lisa. If nothing else, she could keep her safe.

But as for everyone else...
141211122.title: Julie Screws Up... Again. Big-Time.

choices: Lisa wakes up and tries to talk sense into Julie
Julie continues her domination of the city
1412111222.content:
"L-LISA..." Julie boomed. "TELL ME AGAIN HOW BIG I AM."

The tiny voice inside her head answered. "Four miles. At least. Maybe four and a half."

"THAT'S REALLY, REALLY BIG, LIS." Julie was bending over a bit, trying to see past her chest to her feet.

"I know," the voice answered. "We've got to--"

"SO IF I'M THIS BIG," Julie interrupted. She was squatting down a bit now. "EVERYONE PRETTY MUCH HAS TO BE LOOKING AT ME, RIGHT?"

She could hear Lisa sigh. "Jules, every time you squat down like that, the pressure changes and I feel like my ears are going to pop out. Could you please hold still?"

At this, Julie giggled. "JUST BY BENDING OVER?"

"Just by bending over," Lisa repeated.

She laughed again. The feeling of power she had even in her barest movements was making her giddy. "WHAT DO YOU THINK THEY'RE THINKING DOWN THERE, LIS? ALL THE TINY PEOPLE LIKE YOU. THE ONES AT MY FEET."

~*~


Inside Julie's ear, Lisa sighed, shaking her head. What was all of this all of a sudden? She felt dizzy, the sudden changes in height of her gargantuan companion doing a number on her equilibrium, but she had to talk Julie through all of this.

"Well, if they're like me, they're pretty scared," she answered honestly. "I mean, you've looked like this to me for a little while now, and I was pretty terrified."

There was another rush of air--Julie was squatting down again, and Lisa's ears felt like they were going to explode. She screamed from the pain, and the sudden jerk of Julie's mammoth head indicated that she heard her. She waited to see if her friend would express even the slightest concern.

"RIGHT, BUT THAT WASN'T ALL, WAS IT?" Julie said. "IT WAS... KIND OF NICE FOR YOU, WASN'T IT?"

Lisa shuddered. Where could this be going? "Jules, I saw an ant that was the size of a minivan. I've never been so scared in my--"

The rush happened again. Julie was standing up now, faster than she had before, and this time the change was too much. Lisa collapsed, falling unconscious inside of her friend's ear.

~*~


Julie, meanwhile, had risen to her full height again, staring down at the ground below her. Goosebumps rose on her flesh. "I'M TALKING ABOUT WHEN YOU WERE IN MY BOOBS," Julie continued, fidgeting with the buttons on her blouse. "IT WAS KIND OF SCARY, BUT ADMIT IT: I'M PRETTY SEXY, LIS." With a smile, she began slowly unbuttoning her blouse, bending over. "I, LIKE, DON'T WANT TO SOUND STUCK-UP, BUT I KNOW I'M REALLY HOT. I SEE THE WAY GUYS LOOK AT ME. DO YOU THINK THEY'RE LOOKING AT ME LIKE THAT RIGHT NOW?"

She paused, waiting for an answer. When none came, she laughed, pulling her arms through her blouse and throwing it over her shoulder. "OH, DON'T GET SHY ON ME, GIRLFRIEND. IT'S OKAY. I SAW THAT SMILE ON YOUR FACE WHEN I PULLED YOU OUT. I DON'T MIND. WHATEVER MAKES YOU HAPPY."

Then, all at once, Julie dropped down to all fours, letting her massive breasts dangle above the crowds below. She lowered her face to the ground, letting it hover over downtown, delighting in the way even her hairs dwarfed the finger-length skyscrapers below her head.

"DO I MAKE YOU HAPPY, MY LITTLE TINY PEOPLE?" she cooed. She saw her hot breath begin to bend and rock the skyscrapers, which made her laugh even more. She had so much power over these little people that even her breath could rock the foundations of their greatest buildings. "HAVE YOU EVER SEEN BOOBS THIS BIG?" She rose to her knees, smiling, stretching her arms high into the sky. She turned around, looking towards her back. "ARE YOU LOOKING UP MY SKIRT, LITTLE BUG-PEOPLE? DO YOU LIKE THAT?" She rose higher, still on her knees, wiggling her backside all the while. She looked down at the ground, at the crowds of people beneath her, the little specks of dust between the finger-sized buildings... and she was pleased to see that many of them had stopped. She couldn't imagine what it was like, their little necks craning up to look at the massive bombshell who towered above them all. She ruled them, dominated them, demanded every iota of their attention.

"GO AHEAD AND STARE, ITTY-BITTY PEOPLE," she sighed. With a flick of her fingers, she unclasped her bra, then eased it down from her enormous breasts. She put her hands behind her head and wiggled, shaking them for the minuscule people below. "YOU'LL NEVER GET A SHOW LIKE THIS AGAIN."
1412111222.title: The Eyes of the World Upon Her

choices: Julie tries to come up with a plan to activate the remote
Julie's roommate arrives
1412112.content:
Julie is beyond terrified as she frantically ran her nails through the carpet, trying to find Lisa. What if she'd killed her friend? What if Lisa had shrunk down so small that she just stopped existing? What if she got attacked by a spider? Or another bug? Or just fell through the cracks in the floor?

She still has the device, and she's sure now that the button with the plus sign makes things bigger. But what can she do? How can she aim the device at someone so small? What if she misses and hits an ant? Would there be huge, gross ants wandering around in her room?

"Lisa, I'm sorry!" she yells. "But if I can't see you, then I can't--"

Just then, she stops, her eyes beaming.

"Hold on, little Lisa! I'm going to come save you!"

Julie grabs a lipstick container from her desk and, very carefully, dabs a bit of red onto the spot where Lisa shrank away. The frame of reference would certainly help; otherwise, she'd have to comb all through the carpet. Then, with a smile, she stands over the spot, legs spread, careful not to step on the spot where her tiny friend became tragically tinier.

"Here goes nothing!" she calls, aims the device at herself, and presses the minus button.

The flash of light overwhelms her now, and when it subsides, her room is massive, her bed and cabinets now towering hills in the distance. Beneath her, the spot of red lipstick curls up around her feet, and sure enough, she hears screaming.

"Julie, what the hell are you doing?" the voice calls.

She can hear it clearly now, and Julie reaches her hand into the carpet and scoops up her best friend. Lisa stands in Julie's hand, arms akimbo, glaring daggers at her comparatively huge friend from bloodshot, tear-stained eyes.

"I saved you!" Julie says, grinning. "Ta-daaaaaaaaaaaa!"

"You sure did," Lisa grumbles. "I sure feel saved."

"You sure are!" Julie agrees. "And now to bring us back to normal size! All I've got to do is press the button on this..."

She looks at her right hand.

The device isn't there.

"Where is it?" Julie says. "Oh, no, did I drop it in the carpet?"

Lisa points behind her. "You sure did."

Julie turns around slowly, looking up. There, stretching ten feet in the air, the size of a small house, is the device.

"...it doesn't shrink with you," Julie says.

"If it shrank with you, don't you think I would've made myself big again?" Lisa asks.

"Oh, my God," Julie mumbles. She sits down in the carpet, gently placing the tiny Lisa on top of one of the strands. "I screwed everything up! I'm such an idiot! And now we're both going to be teeny-tiny bugs forever!"

And so, sitting on the carpet, the size of a nickel, Julie does the only thing she can think to do. She curls her legs up against her, presses her face to her knees, and bawls her eyes out.

For Lisa, the shock of being shrunk so tiny has passed a bit. She looks at the massive silver object--over a thousand feet tall--in the distance, knowing it to be the remote. She looks around the room, knowing that she's now so small that her tiny eyes can't even take it all in. She looks down at the single carpet fiber at her feet, and she hops once, watching with sadness as her tiny mass doesn't even cause it to move. She would worry about falling, but she knows that she weighs next to nothing; if she fell, there would be no way she would hurt herself.

And so, feeling a little bit brave, Lisa hops from one carpet fiber to another until at last she lands on Julie's skirt. The weave of the fabric provides the perfect handholds for the tiny girl to climb, and she's shocked at how little effort it takes; there's almost no weight for her to lift, so she practically floats up the side of the skirt. At last, she finds herself at Julie's huge leg, which she pats gently.

Julie stops crying for a moment to look down at her tiny friend, her hand on Julie's leg. Lisa smiles up at her, warmly, affectionately, not a hint of malice for what Julie accidentally did to her.

"You know," Lisa says, "we're both really, really small. But I'm a lot smaller than you."

"I'm--I'm sorry..." Julie sputters, but Lisa's warm touch tells her that the tiny girl isn't mad.

"What I mean is that you need to keep me safe," Lisa says. "And there's only one place you could put me that would make me feel safe."

Julie looks down at Lisa, confused for a moment. However, the slight blush on her friend's face says it all. With a smile, Julie scoops Lisa up in her hand, stopping for a moment to give her friend a tiny kiss on the head. Then, as carefully as possible, Julie deposits Lisa safely into the warm confines of her blouse.

"You're just trying to get at my boobs again, aren't you?" Julie says with a small cackle.

"It's hard to get away from them at this size," Lisa says with a sigh, enjoying the soft warmth surrounding her again. "But thank you."
1412112.title: Julie's Brilliant Plan

choices: Morgan spots the remote and her roommate
Morgan doesn't see her, and Julie must try to get her attention
14121122.content:
As Julie stands up--bound and determined to try to activate the device again--the door to the dorm room swings open. Julie looks up in shock at the massive figure standing in the doorway.

"Oh, good!" Lisa says. "It's Morgan! Morgan will help us, right?"

But Julie isn't so sure.

At her normal scale, Morgan is a tall, busty girl with pale white skin and raven black hair, her dark eyeshadow and purple lipstick providing the classic "goth" look. To tiny Julie, though, she is a monster of black leather and steel. Her high-heeled boots tower over the tiny girls, rising to her huge ankles before giving way to fishnet stockings, a tiny black skirt, and a black bustier that accentuates her incredible cleavage. With a sigh, she pulls her backpack off and throws it on the floor, and Julie and Lisa watch with horror as the gigantic pack tumbles out of the sky.

"Oh, shit!" Lisa screams. "RUN!"

Julie doesn't need to be told twice; she stumbles through the thick carpet as the backpack rolls toward her, sliding forward like an avalanche of cloth. The backpack tumbles forward, shaking the ground with earthquake force and knocking the tiny Julie onto her stomach. Poor Lisa holds on tight as her perch tumbles to the ground, barely avoiding being squished flat by Lisa's breasts as her friend catches herself. Finally, Julie looks up to find that the backpack has (fortunately) stopped, and Morgan is now standing overhead, looking around her room.
14121122.title: In the Shadow of Morgan

choices: Morgan squashes the girls flat
Morgan allows Julie to plead her case
141211221.content:
"You've got to try to get her attention," Lisa says. "I know Morgan's kind of weird, but she's our only hope of getting big again!"

Julie hesitates and does something she doesn't normally do: she thinks. "You're probably right," she sighs. "I mean, sure, Morgan can seem a little bit strange sometimes, and she dresses really weird..."

So lost in thought is Julie that she doesn't see the shadow looming overhead.

"Uh... Julie?" Lisa says.

"And yeah, okay, maybe she wears that freakshow makeup, and maybe she's not really very nice sometimes, and maybe she won't ever make her bed..."

"Julie?" Lisa says again. The shadow looms still larger.

"But, I mean, we have to overlook the fact that she's kind of a mean-spirited weirdo and hope she'll help us out, right?"

"JULIE!"

"Oh, for goodness sake, WHAT?" Julie shouts, looking down at the tiny girl in her shirt.

Then she notices it--the shadow looming overhead. Lisa's horrified expression tells the tale, but as Julie slowly turns around, she sees the two pale arms the size of highway overpasses stretching beside her, the pendulous white breasts hovering nearby, the spiked black collar around the long neck... and the face of Morgan herself, bent over, staring down at the girls, an imperious smirk on her face.

"Well, well," she says. "This is a nice little surprise, isn't it?"
141211221.title: Motormouth Julie

choices: Morgan Goes Out With the Gun
Morgan Tries The Growth Button On Herself
1412112211.content:
Julie nervously looks up at her giant roommate. The two had never liked each other and this wasn't a great position for her to be in right now, especially since Morgan had heard her talking smack. "Uh, hi Morgan", Julie nervously stuttered. "I guess you heard all that, huh". "Yep", Morgan said, a sinister expression on her face. "You know I didn't really mean anything by it, right? I was just kidding around". "Sure", Morgan said with a smirk. "No hard feelings".

Julie let out a sigh of relief. "See Lisa", she said to the even tinier girl clutching her shirt, "this is going to work out". Julie looks back up at her colossal roommate. "So as you can see Morgan, I have a bit of a problem. I accidentally shrunk myself with that gun lying over there. My friend Lisa's shrunk even smaller than me. You probably can't see her". "Uh huh", Morgan said, eyeing the gun carefully and picking it up. "So do you think you can help us out? You just need to hit the plus sign there and we can get back to normal".

Morgan stared at her with an evil little smile. "Gee Julie, I'd love to. I really would. Unfortunately though I'm- how did you put it?- a mean-spirited weirdo? Guess that sucks for you and your little friend now, doesn't it? Bye, bitch."

Julie and Lisa's hearts sank as Morgan raised her right boot high in the air. It looked so enormous from where the girls were that it blotted out the entire sky. Julie started to let out a desperate plea. "Morgan, wai-"

SPLAT!

Morgan brought her boot down with enormous force reducing Julie and Lisa to a small red paste on the carpet. She grinded her boot back and forth for a bit. Then she wiped the small girl's remains off her boot with a tissue and threw them in the trash.

"Well, that was satisfying", Morgan said. Julie had been a garbage roommate and now she was only garbage. She didn't know the other girl she had killed that well but two less sorority girls was never a bad thing.

Her roommate now disposed of, Morgan looked at the gun in her hand. "Does this really work?" Morgan pushed the minus button and fired it at Julie's desk. It shrunk to the size Julie had been before she stomped her. She pushed the plus button and the desk grew back to normal. "Oh, I'm going to enjoy using this", Morgan chuckled.
1412112211.title: Morgan squashes the girls flat

choices: Morgan decides to put the girls out of their misery
Morgan has other, more devious plans...
1412112212.content:
Before Julie can hope to escape, Morgan scoops her up, lifting her--and the device--high into the air. For Lisa, this is almost unbearable, and she tightens her grip on Julie's shirt as she's carried for what seems to her like miles over the course of just a few seconds. Julie struggles and wiggles, but Morgan's thumb and index finger are enough to hold the tiny girl aloft as Morgan carries her to her desk. Putting the device down for a second, Morgan drops Julie from her fingers into her other hand, not bothering to worry about the tiny girl's comfort or safety.

Julie, all at once, realizes what Lisa must have realized before: that being this small can be terrifying. And while Lisa was faced with a gigantic version of her best friend and sorority sister, Julie finds herself face-to-enormous-face with her roommate, who has hated and resented her from the moment the two had met. Now, her boulder-sized eyes glare down at the tiny Julie, practically drinking in the sight of her, watching as Julie stumbles backward on her rear end in Morgan's palm before being met with the girl's entrapping fingers.

For Lisa, the feeling is far, far worse. Morgan is everything now--the earth, the sky, the entire universe. Her mouth is like an enormous, wet cavern, and even a simple act like running her tongue across her lips feels like a blue whale breaching in the sea. She can only duck down low in Julie's shirt, hiding as best she can, hoping that this immeasurable monster can't see her.

"Now then," Morgan booms, her hot, minty breath blowing the two girls with hurricane force. "What was that you were saying about me?"

Julie stammers, trying to stand up. "Well, I was just joking around a little, and--"

"BULLSHIT," Morgan bellows, and the force of her voice is enough to knock Julie back down. "Don't act like you've ever liked me, Julie. I know exactly how it is with you sorority girls and the way you like to look down your noses on the freaks. Well, look who's looking down now, huh?"

"I'm sorry!" Julie pleads. "I'm really sorry, Morgan! Please just--just use the machine to make us big again, and--"

"Us?" Morgan interrupts, her eyes growing wider.

Julie stops dead in her tracks. She had been hoping to keep Lisa's presence a secret, to give her tiny friend even the merest chance of escape, but now, it's too late. With a sniff, she reaches into her shirt and plucks out the incredibly tiny Lisa, holding her friend up in the air for Morgan to see.

Morgan moves in close, closing one eye to see better. Lisa cowers in her friend's hand, too terrified to look up, but she knows that the enormous eye of Morgan is peering down at her, looking her over.

"Wow," Morgan whispers, but even her breath in that whisper is enough to almost blow the nearly invisible Lisa off of Julie's outstretched palms. "So she must have been shrunk twice then, huh? I bet you did it, didn't you, you bubble-headed bimbo?"

Julie nods, lowering her head in shame. She runs her pinky finger over her tiny friend's hair, being careful to be as gentle as possible, and even in this small motion she can feel Lisa quivering with fear.

"You sure are nice to her, Julie," Morgan says flatly, moving her hand back again. "Even though you've made her a little grain of sand. I don't know who you are, little girl. You're nothing but a speck to me."

A slow, evil smile suddenly crosses Morgan's face.

"...and I must look like a giant to you."
1412112212.title: In Morgan's Clutches

choices: Julie gives up and lets Morgan crush her
Julie throws herself at Morgan's mercy
14121122121.content:
"Well," Morgan whispered. "If I'm going to be a giant, then I'd better do what giants do. That sounds like a good idea, right?"

Julie looked up at her, trying to fight back tears. "Morgan, please... I'm sorry... just... just make us big again..."

"SORRY?" Morgan roared, and the force of her shout nearly knocked Julie backward. Lisa put her hands over her ears as Morgan continued. "How DARE you try to order me around, you pathetic little bug! You're NOTHING before me!"

And with that, Morgan turned her hand upside-down. The simple movement to her felt like the entire world turning over to Julie, and she screamed as she slid from the open palm through the air, wind rushing around her. Lisa was so terrified that she couldn't even open her eyes, but Julie saw every bit of it, watching as Morgan bent down before her, delighting in her plummet.

Julie landed in the carpet below, remarkably unhurt thanks to her tiny size but with the wind knocked out of her. "Are--are you okay?" she managed to croak before coughing up a lung.

Lisa pried herself free of Julie's shirt, nearly falling over at her coughing fit. She was dazed and dizzy, but she was so small that she had no real mass to strike the ground. "I'm fine, but--"

"OH GOD!" Julie screamed.

A dark shadow covered the girls, blocking out the light above them--Morgan's shoe. The girls screamed, the massive ceiling of leather hovering overhead. When at last it slammed down, it missed Julie by mere inches--even to her. High above, still bent over, Morgan sneered down at the tiny girls.

"Oh, don't worry, bugs, I'm not going to let your little bodies tarnish my beautiful boots," she said. "So long as you stay still, that is."

Julie nodded and froze in place, staring up the length of Morgan's black leather boot, up the black ropes of her fishnet stockings. Lisa couldn't even take it in at all. The boot alone was the size of a mountain to her, and when Morgan bent over and began to unlace it, it was like the earth itself was being remade.

Moments later, Morgan slid her foot from the boot, wiggling her toes as she did. Julie watched, wide-eyed, as she slid her bare foot downward, her big toe directly in front of her. Lisa could only watch in horror as she realized that the grooves of Morgan's toe print were even taller than she was, but even to Julie, the toe was massive--larger than she was.

"No, I'm not going to let my boot crush you," Morgan said with a smile. "I want to feel you die, Julie. I want to press my skin against you as every bone in your body breaks. I want to feel your body snap and crackle. I want to feel the warm gore ooze out of you, and then I want to grind the disgusting little paste that used to be Julie Parks into the carpet. And I want to do it all with my big toe so that you understand how absolutely fucking PATHETIC you are."

Julie begins to sob in heaves. She was really going to do it. This was no joke--Morgan was prepared to utterly end her life now. Was there truly no hope?
14121122121.title: Punishment

choices: Morgan decides to make the girls even smaller
Morgan keeps the tiny girls as pets and looks for more victims
14121122122.content:
"You know what your problem is, Julie?" Morgan says with a smile. "Your big mouth. If you'd have just kept your mouth shut, I think I might have helped you get big again. We could've figured out what this device was and let bygones be bygones. Maybe we could've done some science projects, pulled some pranks, made me into an omnipotent goddess towering over the entire world, who knows?"

Suddenly, Morgan reaches for the device, aiming it at the tiny Julie. Julie tries to run away, but Morgan's fingers stop her, keeping her safely contained.

"But you couldn't keep your big mouth shut, could you?"

Lisa, seeing the device aimed at her once again, suddenly flies into a panic. Fearing the consequences of being shrunk even smaller, she pulls herself out of Julie's shirt and takes a flying leap, knowing full well that her tiny weight will prevent her from being hurt. Julie tries to catch her--not knowing what her friend does--but before she can't, the beam strikes her, the white light enveloping her, the now-familiar sensation of falling overwhelming her.

As Lisa lands, Julie stops shrinking, and the two girls find themselves about a hundred feet apart, roughly the same size, standing in the vast palm of Morgan.

The evil laugh of the goth giantess echoes in the girls' ears as they run towards each other, sharing an embrace, crying into each other's shoulders. "I'm sorry!" Julie bawls. "I'm so, so, so sorry! This is all my fault! If I wasn't such a dummy then--"

"It's okay..." Lisa whispers, running her hand through her friend's hair. "It's okay. We'll get through this. I know we can..."

"AWWWWWWWWWWW, ISN'T THAT PRECIOUS?" a rumbling voice calls from seemingly everywhere.

The two girls both snap to attention, staring upward, the eye of Morgan stretching out above them like a moon. The dust mite-sized sorority sisters clutch each other tightly, neither knowing what to expect, only knowing that they are now at the mercy of a cruel girl who was, not twenty minutes ago, their same size.

"TWO BEST FRIENDS, REUNITED!" Morgan laughs. "ITTY-BITTY BESTIES, REDUCED TO NOTHING BEFORE THE MIGHT OF THE GODDESS MORGAN!"

Her laughter echoes again, and the girls shiver with terror. They're having a hard time believing it, but looking at the huge face of Morgan, looking at the lines in her hand that stretch out around them like small canyons... maybe there is something to this. Maybe Morgan is a goddess after all.
14121122122.title: Into Nothingness

choices: Follow along with Morgan in the carpet
Follow the two microscopic girls on the desk
141211221221.content:
The wild look in Morgan's huge eyes tells the story: the girl has gone completely mad with power. With a huge grin, she holds the device aloft, aiming it into the palm of her hand.

"I AM A GODDESS, YOU KNOW," she booms. "I ALWAYS HAVE BEEN. I'M JUST NOW TAKING ON MY TRUE FORM. AND IF YOU ASK ME, A GODDESS'S WORSHIPERS SHOULD BE MUCH, MUCH SMALLER THAN THIS."

Lisa and Julie stare up in shock, the barrel of the device stretching overhead like a pipe the size of a city. They hold each other close, finding small comfort in each others' arms, until Julie--remembering how her friend was able to survive the long fall--gets an idea.

"JUMP!" she screams.

Just as the two tiny girls make for the edge of Morgan's palm, a bright flash fills the air again. They feel the sinking feeling again, as if the air is being sucked out of them... but something is different.

As they continue running for Morgan's palm, the edge seems to be getting closer... not further away. The girls are certainly shrinking, but the ridges in Morgan's palm aren't getting any larger. Which means...

"She got herself!" Lisa shouts. "Oh God, she's shrinking with us!"

As the girls make their last leap, still shrinking, still growing incredibly small, they look back to see the terrified expression on Morgan's face. The girls land gently on top of the surface of Morgan's desk, but the previously gigantic girl continues to dwindle.

"NO!" she shrieks. "NO! YOU TINY SLAVES, GET BACK HERE!"

By the time it's all said and done, Morgan has disappeared into the distance. A huge abyss stretches out beneath them, and it's virtually impossible for them to see the bottom. Morgan is down there--somewhere--but at their size, they can't see down that far.

"We did it!" Julie says, embracing her friend tightly. "We're safe!"

"I wouldn't be so sure," Lisa mutters. "Look."

Julie turns around, looking behind her, and she gasps at the sight. The nearest object to her is a strange network of white fibers stretching for hundreds of feet in the air and far, far longer either direction. Her eyes spy a much, much taller but much less wide silver tower in the distance. The desk below their feet--smooth to the touch at normal size--is a lattice of wood fibers, each one twice as wide as the tiny girls are tall.

But it's the white fibers that draw their attention. Julie fearfully steps closer, desperate to figure out what the object is.

"Is that some kind of mold?" she asks. "Did she just get some really nasty stuff on her desk?"

Suddenly, Lisa's eyes go wide. She stares up at the object's incredible height, and the reality of her size hits her like a ton of bricks.

"It's paper..." she whispers.

Julie gasps. "A stack of paper is THAT big?"

"No," Lisa says, almost too terrified to state the truth. "That's not a stack of paper. That huge thing is... it's one sheet of paper."
141211221221.title: A Tiny Dose of Karma

choices: The door to the dorm room was opening!
A dust mite--hundreds of feet tall--was towering over the girls!
1412112212212.content:
Julie could scarcely believe her eyes. "You mean... that huge plateau over there... the one about a mile away... is one sheet of paper?"

Lisa sighed, doing some quick calculations in her head. "That's not a mile away. That's less than an inch away."

Julie gasped, turning back to Lisa. "You're kidding me."

Lisa shook her head. "Unless my math is wrong, what looks like a mile to us is only about a quarter of an inch. We could walk across this desk for hours and not even travel a foot. If we can find a crumb of bread or something like that, we could probably feed ourselves for a long time, but at our size we probably wouldn't even be able to break the surface tension of a drop of water, never mind drink it" With a sigh, Lisa hung her head. "We're really, really, really small, Julie, and I don't know how we can get big again."

Lisa, who had been grappling with her own size for some time now, accepted the news with resignation. For Julie, however, it was like being hit with a ton of bricks--a ton of bricks that, to her, would be continent-sized. Dropping to her knees on the latticed wood fiber of the immeasurable desk, she buried her face in her hands, sobbing.

"What can we do then?" she sniffed. "Nobody can see us. The only person who knows we're here wants to kill us. Do we just wait until we die? Oh God, Lisa, I don't want to die!"

And with that, Julie threw herself against her friend, bawling and sobbing into her chest. Lisa knelt down and held her close, rubbing her hand down her back. "All we can do is stick together and hope for a miracle," Lisa said. "We're tiny, but we're not alone. I've got you and you've got me."

Julie lifted her head up, looking into her friend's eyes. She saw that Lisa was forcing a smile, trying to be optimistic, but there was certainly an undercurrent of defeat behind the look. She understood at last what Lisa meant earlier about feeling safe, about needing protection. When Lisa was tiny and Julie was bigger, she did what she could to help her friend. At this scale, though, all they had was each other.

And so as Julie pulled herself up, the two girls' eyes met, and they shared a long, tender kiss, the feelings that they'd secretly held for each other for so long finally let out. On the infinite wood fiber of the desk, they explored each other's bodies with their hands, sharing in the only comfort they could ever hope to know now in their new lives as microscopic creatures. Then, draped in each other's arms, clad only in their underwear, the two girls fell asleep, Lisa's head on Julie's chest.

Neither girl was certain for how long they slept, but before long, a new noise woke them up.
1412112212212.title: Waiting for a Miracle

choices: ...one of the dust mites in the distance. She wants to ride one?!
...the...paper? Maybe someone will pick it up, but not likely...
14121122122122.content:
Lisa blinked. Raising her head up off of her friends pillows, she yawned and stretched her arms, surveying the surroundings. Something had woken her up. She could swear she heard a loud thumping, like somebody tapping their fingers on the desk. Looking around, she only saw the strange, alien landscape that had filler her view previously. The immeasurably large mass of white fibers, and the strange interlocking wooden landscape, and the tall grey thing...

Wait...

Julie woke up by the sound of Lisa screeching, and quickly stood up, remembering what had happened last night. Wiping her eyes, she found her friend next to her, trembling with fear. She followed her friends gaze upwards, and froze. "Oh. My. God."

A large, terrifying grey creature stood before them. With a strangely potato shaped body, 6 terrifyingly thick claw-like legs, with 4 in the front, and 2 in the back, and a disgusting, pincer-like mouth, the girls could only watch as it's...antennae(?) twitched, sending reverberations through the air, like strong gusts of wind. This thing stood above them at hundreds of feet tall, nearly at thousands!

"Lisa, what the hell is that?!" asked Julie, as she scooped up her previously discarded clothes, staring at it all the while. Lisa just couldn't say a word. She was trying to process what kind of creature it was. Her first thought was that it was an ant...or a bedbug or something...but it was something far worse. "Julie, I think...I think we're looking at a dust mite."

Julie gasped, and stared up at the creature, the sight of it making her a little sick to her stomach. She'd already come to terms with the fact that she was practically microscopic, but...a single dust mite, this big?! As if the paper wasn't bad enough... "Lisa! What are we gonna do! We're gonna die! It's gonna eat us and we're gonna-" THWACK. A reverberating boom filled the air as the creatures gross leg moved slightly. Then, after a moment of pause, another series of reverberating, thunderous booms filled the air as the creature sped off, faster then anything Lisa or Julie thought could possibly move.

The sounds and movements left the girls on the ground, gasping for breath. As they tried to compose themselves, Lisa muttered "It...we're so small...it couldn't even see us." Julie didn't reply. She was trying to take it all in. "So...Lisa...what are we going to do? We...probably shouldn't stay here. I don't know anything about dust mites, but they don't go alone, do they?" "...if there was one, there will be more, yeah." Lisa said, picking herself off the ground.

"So...we need to get out of here. I have an idea." "An idea?" Julie asked, joining her friend in getting off the ground. "If we can get to the science lab and get under a microscope, someone will be able to see us, won't they?" Julies eyes lit up. "Of course! So stupid! Why didn't I think of that! Wait...Lisa...there's no way. We're too small to get there." "Well I know we can't walk there, Julie...I was thinking we could get a lift there on something!" "A lift...on what?" Julie asked, curious as to what her friend thought they could possibly get a lift on. Lisa smiled, and motioned towards...
14121122122122.title: A dust mite--hundreds of feet tall--was towerin...

choices: One of the other dorm rooms.
The cafeteria.
Somewhere Else.
1413.content:
Lisa waited for what seemed like forever but in reality it was only about an hour. She had climbed back down to the floor quite awhile ago.

"Doesn't look like anyone's coming in here." Lisa silently said to herself. This didn't surprise her too much since Danica her roomate was quite the party machine. She often didn't come to the room for days at a time. Lisa knew what this meant, if help wasn't going to come to her she have to get help herself.

"I guess there's really no other choice." she thought as she aproached her colassal door. She stared at it for just a minute, hoping it would just open up and she would be saved. Of course that wasn't likely to happen anytime soon.

So she mustered up some courage and squeezed underneath the gap in the door. Surpisingly she was just small enough to acomplish such a feat, if she were even half an inch bigger she wouldn't have fit.

Lisa was outside the door to her dorm room. The enourmous halls were lined with dozens of rooms jurt like hers. Each housing students just like her, the only difference was they had not shrunk like she had.

Where does she look for help?
1413.title: Venturing Outside

choices: Lisa continues to shrink Danica slowly
Lisa begins to grow Danica
Lisa grows Danica a bit too much
143.content:
Lisa put the gun to her chest and prepared to fire on herself. She paused a minute, thinking over her decision.

"Wait a minute," she thought to herself. "What if this thing malfunctions? I mean, if this thing does what I think it does, then if I shrink myself too small, I won't be able to grow myself back." She placed the device down on the table in front of her, staring at it for several moments. "I think I'll just wait for Danica to come back. I'll just have to be subtle about it."

Lisa continued to study the device, adjusting the settings on it and firing it at several objects around her dorm, to get a feel for just how powerful it was. She switched The Reducer to shrink and fired at her bed and watched as it shrunk to the size of a matchbox, before returning it to its original size a few minutes later.

About thirty minutes later, Danica returned, having just returned from her daily jog around campus. Quickly, Lisa stashed the reducer under the pillows on her bed, and walked out to greet her friend.

"Hi, Lisa," Danica said, sweat glistening off her trim body. She grabbed a towel from the hamper and wiped her face with it. "Any mail today?" Lisa pointed to the table and Danica walked over, She flipped through the envelopes, not seeing anything of interest to her, since most mail they received was mostly credit card applications or stuff like that.

"Hmm," Danica said, placing the mail back on the table. "Nothing good today. I'm going to take a shower." She went into her room and grabbed a fresh pair of clothes, before going to the bathroom. As soon as she heard water running, Lisa took the Reducer out again, thinking of how to use the device on Danica without her friend finding out. "I've got it," Lisa thought to herself.

About ten minutes later, Danica walked into the kitchen area, looking for something to eat. She had her back to Lisa, giving the 21 year old a perfect shot. Slowly, and with shaking hands, Lisa raised the device at her friend, making sure the device was switched to "Shrink." Firing a quick burst, she fired, hitting her friend squarely in the back.

She watched her friend shudder momentarily, then, it seemed as if she did, in fact, shrink a little. Just a few inches, though.

Again, Lisa fired. And again, Danica shrank only a few inches. Curious as to how much smaller she had made her friend, Lisa placed the reducer under her pillows again and walked over to Danica. Before, the two girls were roughly the same height, about 5'5". Now it was clear, as Lisa walked closer, that she was close to 7 inches taller than her dorm mate.

"Hey, Danica," Lisa said innocently, standing next to her, as Danica took a Tupperware bowl out of the fridge and placed it on the counter. Danica paused. Something seemed off.

"What's wrong?" Lisa asked.

"The counter seems...larger somehow."

"I'm sure it's just your imagination. You just came back from a run. Maybe you're a little bit more tired than usual."

"Yeah, maybe," Danica said, unsure. She picked up the bowl, got a spoon out of one of the drawers, and sat down on the couch, flipping on the TV.

Lisa walked back to her room and picked up the reducer again. She was beginning to feel guilty for shrinking her friend, but the rush she felt while doing it was hard to deny. She had to do it again.

Lisa pointed the device at her friend again, making sure the setting were what she wanted them to be and fired...
143.title: Test it on Danica

choices: Danica agrees to go along with Lisa's 'fun'!
Danica is furious with Lisa, and demands to be returned to normal
Danica has another idea
1431.content:
Lisa fired the device again, shrinking Danica from 4' 10" to 4' 6". Lisa would now be near a whole foot taller than her friend.

She watched her friend’s diminished body, Danica's clothes definitely looked more loose and baggy than before.

"What a rush!" Lisa thought, before firing again. This time Danica went from 4' 6" to an even 4'. Danica hadn't noticed anything amiss, probably due to the fact she was sat on the couch, and engrossed in day time TV.

Lisa put on a coat and boots and decided to go walk around campus. She slipped the device into the front pocket of her coat as she left. She didn't have class until 2:30 today, so she had some time to kill.

As she walked around, she considered what to do with the device. She briefly considered trying it out on a statue of one of the school's founders, but decided she didn't have much use for a knick-knack like that. She really didn't care what that old dead guy wrote, or what classes he taught. And besides, the statue was right in the middle of campus, and it would have been too conspicuous to zap it and take it. Lisa didn't want anybody to know that she had the device. (On one hand, if it worked, she wanted to keep it a secret, and keep whatever it is that she shrunk secret. On the other, if it didn't work, she would be so embarrassed if anybody saw her whip it out only for it to not do anything).

Lisa decided to find somewhere a bit more quiet. A bit more secluded. She hurried to the north quad of the campus, where there was a lone dining hall and a single dorm situated on a large, open field. The field was huge, and was used by students to play sports, have picnics, or sometimes to rehearse bands and dance groups. Normally, this would be far too many people, but, since it was only 10:30 am on a Tuesday morning, most people were either at class, at a job, or at the library (and if they weren't, they were probably sleeping). She only saw a group of girls, three of them, sitting at the edge of the field having what looked like either a picnic or an outside study session. They were probably a good 1500 feet from her. Far too far away to notice if something suddenly changed size.

She sat down on a bench opposite the dining hall. It looked like it was just closing, perhaps setting up for the incoming lunch rush at 11:30. She watched, seeing if any students might stagger out on their way to class. None did.

10:45. Campus would be flooded at 10:55 with students running to their next class, and she would either have to shrink someone before then or after, in order to avoid attention. She was thinking, at this point, at just going over to the group of girls. They didn't look like they would be leaving soon.

She saw, out of the corner of her eye, someone approaching her. She watched as the woman came into view. She was tall, and dressed in a jogging outfit of a hoodie, black bicycle shorts, and big, white running shoes. Strawberry blonde hair was tied behind her in a ponytail, and it bobbed slightly as the woman jogged towards where Lisa was sitting.

Lisa almost instantly reached for the device, and wrapped her fingers around it as the woman came closer and closer into view. She was gorgeous - and Lisa thought she would make the most adorable little pet. Lisa immediately saw images of the tiny woman gripped in Lisa's hands as she pet her body with her fingers, and training her do to little tricks. It would be adorable.

To Lisa's surprise, the woman actually slowed down as she approached. Without saying a word, the woman slowed and sat down on the bench, pulling out her phone to send a message. Lisa turned to face her, staring at her with wide eyes as her new plaything nearly fell right into her lap. Well, next to her lap. Her eyes scanned the woman from head to toe, lingering on her long legs for a moment. She looked a few years older than Lisa, perhaps 24 or 25, and perhaps a graduate student or PhD candidate.

"Hey" Lisa said to the woman, trying to get her attention. The woman had headphones in, and didn't seem to hear Lisa. Taking advantage of this, Lisa slid the device out of her pocket, cradling it in her palm. She positioned it towards the woman and hovered her thumb over the button with the minus on it, and then pressed the button.

She watched as the woman went from being perhaps 5'9" or 5'10" - a statuesque beauty - to a much smaller size almost instantly. The woman went from reclining on the bench to suddenly laying flat in a spread eagle position, dazed from the sudden experience of shrinking. Curiously, the phone did not shrink with her, though the rest of her clothes and belongings did. The phone hovered in place for a moment and then fell onto the bench, bouncing off of the wood and landing on top of the woman's legs.

Lisa held her breath as she reached over and picked up the phone, slipping it into her pocket. She set the device down in her lap, and then lowered her face down near the now-tiny woman. The tiny woman slowly sat up, and shrieked as she saw Lisa's gigantic face looming above her.

"Hi" Lisa said, smiling. The tiny woman was silent. "Hold still, okay?" Lisa said.

Lisa then reached over to the tiny woman and picked her up with both hands. One hand gripped around her torso, while the other pressed against the tiny woman's shoes, as if to support her. Lisa traced the woman's right leg with her finger, and then pinched her tiny calf in between to legs and flexed the woman's leg, bending it at the knee. Campus would be swarming with students in a few minutes, and she didn't want anyone to see her new prize. Tilting the tiny woman right back up, she said. "You're going to have to hide for now, okay? But you're too big. You look like you're Barbie-sized right now, so I'm going to have to make you smaller. She picked up the device from her lap and activated it on the woman again, feeling her get smaller in her grasp. Lisa stood up, adjusting her grip on the tiny woman. Rachel, who was stepping carefully over the beach to get into the water, Amy would've tried to get her attention, but at their size difference, she was practically invisible to the 50ft giantess. Looking around at the rest of the beach, she saw those boys who'd stolen her remote getting carried by their moms as they left the beach, and several Tinies trying to play volleyball with a normal sized ball and net, while the Normies and Giants played at their own nets. She heard a jingling noise behind her and when she turned to look, there was a dachshund at full sprint running right for her, its owner holding on to the leash for dear life, trying to get the dog to stop.

Getting back into position to tan, she didn't notice that the purse had been knocked over, and had fired off as it fell out of the purse into the sand.

"Good." Alicia said, zipping up her purse before looking out at the ocean, "It's a little crowded though, too many giants." Indeed, almost thirty people were in the neighborhood of 20-50 feet tall now, making huge waves in the water as they played around.

Amy giggled, rolling over to expose her front, stretching and enjoying the warm sun on her tiny naked body, "Yeah... too bad it's not safe for Tinies, otherwise I'd really enjoy a dip." She remembered reading a story about a tiny who'd gone swimming in a local lake and got eaten by a bass, not a pleaent way to go.

"We ever decide what to do with the remote?" Alicia asked as she layer to out to dry off and enjoy the sun next to her diminutive friend.

Amy shook her head, "No. I'm thinking we should find someone who'd just want to buy it for it's looks. I paid $12 for it, somebody should want it for a bit more." She rolled her shoulders, taking care of an itch on her back, "Just to make some level of profit."

Alicia nodded, seeing the common sense in that. "Alright then, are we just gonna go back to Alexi, sell it online, or pawn it off to a random person that thinks it looks cool?"

Amy scrunched up her face in thought, any of these ideas were valid, though she did have loyalty to aLexi as a fellow tiny, and he'd been buying from her for a while ... "I'm thinking Alexi, but I feel somebody wants it before then, it's all theirs."

"Alright." Alicia nodded, and the two got comfy enjoying the summer sun.

After a relaxing day in the beach, Alicia and Amy decided to just take the offer that Alexi made the other day, and headed back to the mall, looking at the massive craters from some giants' feet in the asphalt as they entered the door. It wasn't long until they got to Alexi's store, and they saw a new face working here, a boy that looked somewhere around college age stocking shelves.

"Ah!" Alexi called from the counter, "You return! Perhaps with something new, yes?"

Amy sighed, pointing at the remote that Alicia was stating down next to the two tinies, "No, I figured that I'd take your offer ... if it still stands."

Alexi walked over to the remote before holding his hand out to Amy, "I make better offer, $28."

Amy smirked, "$30."

"Deal!" Alexi called out to the new guy, "Oy! Chuck! Grab this and put it by TV's!"

The employee nodded, but as he picked up the remote, Alicia found herself buried under a bikini, squirming her way out from under it before waving up at Amy. Alexi whistled over at the cash register, and Sally appeared, dragging one ten and twenty dollar bills behind her, clearly a bit of an effort at her shrunken height, but nobody noticed.

"Here you go Amy!" Alexi said as Sally laid out on the cool glass countertop next to the money, taking deep breaths. "I hope to do more future business!"

Amy smiled and nodded, dragging the $30 over to the edge of the counter and shoving it off, letting Alicia start gathering it up before waving goodbye and hopping down after it. After a few minutes of gathering what they needed form the strange purse next to the discarded bikini, the two shrunken naked roommates headed out to head home, having to navigate the mall at a shared 1.5 inch height now, and no remote to luck them out of tough spots. Amy lugging their keys behind her while Alicia dragged the money behind her.

Do we follow the shrunken lives of Amy and Alicia, or follow the next unaware owners of the remote?

Amy shrugged, she was dragging their key ring, "Its because we're Tinies," they stopped about a foot away from Alexi's pawn shop door for a breather, "but we've managed this far pretty well, right?"

A blonde news anchor was busy wrapping up a story that Amy would've found interesting, but due to circumstances was unable to hear.

"...and that is why cats aren't allowed in jello factories. In other news, the city of Sizeburgh recently has developed several sinkholes across its street and parking lots, the city maintains that its roads have been up to code for years, but the common folk have a different story to say."

As the second camera came on screen, the anchor found herself shrunken to an inch and a half, unable to get herself onto the desk, a crew member came over and gently lifted her up to the desk, allowing her tiny naked self to be seen on camera and continue the report.

"Mr. Todd, the officials state that there is nothing wrong with their streets, yet reports are coming in about massive sinkholes. Care to comment?"

"Hi Jane, long time viewer, and the potholes have gotten out of control. Yesterday my car got lodged in one that popped up overnight." He said, everyone ignoring that is was now impossible for him to fit inside any car now.

Jane nodded, "Some Normals say that this is the fault of Giants walking with heavy feet, or giant delinquents, rather than the city's fault. Care to comment?"

"Jane, that is a load of BS and we know it, Giants have lived here in Sizeburgh for a long time, I was born and raised here, and this is only just now happening. City's hall has got to get its stuff together."

"Thank you Mr. Todd, and next we have a Normals perspective on the subject." Jane motioned to a well dressed Asian woman in a very expensive suit. "Here with us is Mrs. Nguyen, ma'am, what are your thoughts?"

"Jane, these Giants are destroying our city and eating us out of house and home, I know they've been here for years, but we've seen fleets of 18 wheelers rolling in to feed a single family of giants. They've picked up their food intake in the last few days and its unsustainable." At this the remote blinked, causing Mrs. Nguyen to grow to fifty feet tall, her $700 suit torn to ribbons around her. "I know that I've been managing my diet for a while now, and I don't have to be fed by a big rig."

"Very interesting ma'am," Jane said calmly, wondering why a Giant would side with Normals over their own kind enough to identify as one, "thank you for your time." The camera closed down and Jane looked back at the camera, "Now we go live with our man on the street, Calvin. Calvin, what can you tell us?"

The city officials and the locals have plenty of problems to work out here."

14533111211222121111112213111121121222.content:
After a ride to the hotel that involved many, many delays due to the horse going the wrong way, or simply not listening to its diminutive rider, Alicia and Amy disembarked and handed the tiny girl the fair owed.

As they walked into the hotel, the air conditioning turned up to high levels to acomidate its customers due to the very high heat and humidity outside, the remote sparked a bit, the rapid changes in pressure and temperature over the course of the last day, from city to airport to tropics to air conditioning. They all added up to some minor damage to the remote, namely the fact that the "Plus" button, which was still stuck, was now firmly wedged into its postition, it'd take a good amount of force to press that button again! That, and the growth function was, for the moment, completely fried, now all the poor, unaware victims of the device would shrink.

Which is exactly what happened when the two entered the hotel.

The sparks caused the remote to send off several flashes across the lobby, striking many employees and guests alike, leaving several dozen piles of clothes across the floor.

------------------

Two maids who had just entered the elevator found themselves standing shorter than the wheels on their supply cart, their skirts, blouses and aprons piled up around them as they wormed their way out. Once the elevator reached their destination floor, they pushed and pulled with all their might, but were unable to get their cart moving, which meant that the doors closed on the two girls. Which left the two naked Tiny's to figure out just how they'd pressed the buttons up so high in the first place.

Two brothers who'd been excited for their surfing trip suddenly found their surfboards to be too large to even budge a millimeter. Not to mention them having to dig themselves out from under what appeared to be abandoned swim trunks, thankfully, a pair of very pretty surfer girls agreed to help them out in exchange for dinner. One can only imagine how the surfing episode will go later on at the beach...

A bellboy who'd been carrying luggage and following a pretty heiress, who insisted that no poor person would ever touch her precious puppy 'Nubs' the pug, found himself and the heiress both at the shrunken height of 1.5 inches. The bellboy, after successfully getting himself out from under his cap, tried to continue carrying her bags, and the heiress, after digging her way out of an abandoned $3,000 dress, had taken to riding around on her pug, and and failing to get the stupid dog to listen to her directions.

------------------

As all this was going on, Alicia and Amy were at the front desk, watching the employee hop from button to button, entering their information and confirming their identities for their reservation. It was slow going, especially since the poor man had to climb his way back up the counter to even see the computer. But once they'd gotten their keys and their room, and dropped their bags off, they were now ready for their first night out on the town! Where to?
