145331112112221211111122131111211212222.content:
Wanting to get into feeling like a local, the girls decided to go to the local market nearby, which was setup with mostly outdoor stalls and one or two wealthier people having a small air-conditioned building. A short walk later and they were there, under the tents and amongst the locals.

"This just feels like going back in time!" Amy said as she looked around at the stalls from her place between Alicia's breasts.

Alicia laughed, "Yeah, it's pretty rustic."

As she navigated her way through the crowded market, her purse, and subsequently the remote, got knocked from her arm by a woman in a lab coat who was in quite the hurry. As the remote bounced across the street, it fired off many, many shots that affected a good chunk of the market.

"Oh, where is it?" Alicia said, having gathered up her purse and most of the stuff from it, only missing the remote.

"Is that it over there?" Amy asked, pointing to the remote, partially buried under a lab coat.

"Yes!" Alicia said, carefully heading over to it, not wanting to step on any Tinies who were navigating the variously piles of clothes on the marketplace grounds. As she situated the remote in her purse, the lady who'd bumped into her, a blonde woman approximately 38 years old, was working her way under the lab coat, and appeared to be clutching her head. Much like most of the market place, like that guy way over in the corner selling bags of weed, which were as big as he was now.

"Ohmigosh!" Alicia said, quickly helping Amy out of her breasts and setting her down by the blonde woman, letting another Tiny help out another one was best so as to avoid accidents. "Are you alright ma'am? I didn't step on you did I?" Alicia was on the verge of tears, the last thing she'd ever want to do was hurt anybody.

"N-No, I'm fine." The blonde said as Amy helped her up. "Thank you."

"What were you in such a hurry for?" Amy asked, curious as to why a Tiny would be running through such a crowded place without a Normal go help them put.

"I work for the government, we lost a prototype and had detected that it'd ended up back here on the isl- THERE IT IS!" She quickly said, seeing the remote in Alicia's purse.

"Oh, that thing?" Amy laughed, "Bought it off an old guy at a dump and it doesn't work. Trust me, we've tried."

The blonde wasn't having it though, "We detected it activating erratically at the San Palm hotel not an hour ago." At the two girls surprised faces, the blonde continued, "I guess that is your hotel then."

"B-but, we've never seen it DO anything!" Alicia said, quickly getting out of the way of a group moving through the market.

The blonde nodded, "It had an inbuilt protection feature, making anything it did appear normal, despite the obvious logical flaws that it'd produce."

"Well then what's it do?" Amy said, greatly intrigued.
145331112112221211111122131111211212222.title: Check out the shopping center/mall

1453311121122212111111221311112112122222.content:
The blonde seemed to debate with herself before relenting, looking up at the normal sized Alicia above her, before looking back at Amy, "It can shrink or grow things."

Alicia and Amy started laughing, "Come on!" Amy said, clutching her belly as she continued laughing, "You really expect us to believe that this is a device that can change an objects size? I think we would've noticed."

Alicia nodded in agreement above the two Tinies.

The blonde though, continued, "I know you don't believe me, but it's true! If we take it to the lab we can scan it and see how many changes it's made and reverse them! The last thing we need is someone getting hurt by growing or something causing damage due to a new size."

"Alright, alright, we'll take it there and see what happens, how's that?" Alicia said, lifting Amy and the blonde in her hand, depositing Amy back between her breasts and seating the blonde on her shoulder.

"That'd be great!" The blonde cheered, "You can call me Alice."

"Well then Alice," Amy asked from her perch in Alicia's bosom,"where're we headed?"

Alice looked around from her position on Alicia's shoulder before pointing at a little office building up the street, "Right there! Dead ahead!"

"Alrighty then, let's just see if you're telling the truth Alice." Amy and Alicia said, though to be honest, they were curious on whether or not it was true. Or a highly elaborate scam, who could say?

1453311121122212111111221311112112122222.content:
Once at the door, Alicia held Alice up to the camera, "Hey guys! It me! I found the device!" Alice gestured to Alicia's purse, and there was a faint buzzing sound, causing the door to pop open slightly. "Alright Alicia," Alice said, pointing down the hall, "straight ahead!"

Alicia nodded and headed in, eventually finding the lab, which looked like the stereotypical lab with lots of computers and dodads that nobody knew the purpose of, and tons of wires running across the ground. "Alright Alice," a brunette said as she walked up to the trio, taking Alice in her own hand from Alicia, "show sun the device."

Alicia pulled out the remote, causing it to go off, shrinking the brunette, a girl swapping out a hard drive in a computer, and two of the guys at the computers typing. A moment as the brunette dug her way out from under the pile of clothes before she motioned for Alicia to follow. "Bring it over here!" She called from the floor, pointing to a table with a monitor, Alicia made the trip in four steps, while Alice and the brunette would've taken a good while if Alicia hadn't picked them up.

"So, you think this is the remote, er, device you're looking for?" Amy asked from her place between Alicia's breasts.

Alice nodded, "we're going to plug it in and run a diagnostic on it, see how many times it's been fired, and of its been damaged."

Alicia nodded and took a seat, watching as the two guys had resumed typing, hopping on their keyboards to code something for their program, whatever it was. The girl swapping out the hard drive was now standing in her computer, making sure that everything was plugged in and secure, before realizing that she was a true risk for static shock, being only 1.5 inches like her coworkers, and inside a computer! Thankfully it was off. And Alice and her brunette superior were dragging a USB style cable to the remote, and boy, did it look like it took effort! The two 1.5 inch girls dragged that cable across the foot long distance between them and the remote, but they did it!

"Now." The brunette said as she started hopping on her laptop to star the the diagnostic program, "Lets see what we've got here."

info.brief_description: What would happen if you found a laser gun that could shrink/grow things? (Cliché)
info.description:
~~~Basic Info~~~

In this story you have a choice in between both either male and/or female characters who has found a dangerous weapon known as a the "Reducer"

Honestly this is an experiment. I just wanted to see if I can pull off one of these kinds of stories. Anyway I've got nothing to lose so just read these "simple" rules.

~~~Rules~~~

-You can kill off characters off but I really don't recommend it. You don't have to kill a character if you don't like them but please don't just instantly write them out of the story in one sentence, the story just revolves around whoever you want so feel free to change the lead character."

-I don't mind Vore, feet, or any of that other stuff, just make it believable and not the mian focus of the story. (By believable I mean. What would a real person, in real life actually do?)

-No sex. Honestly this is the only rule I cannot allow, NO EXCEPTIONS! I didn't write to have it become an adult fictional story.

-Nudity is now allowed, just remember the rule above this one.

-I guess, no homosexual characters but that pretty much falls under the no sex rule. Still if you have the urge to make a person become a homosexual branch it off in another chapter.

-No severe swearing. (Let's make it simpler, just don't use the F-Word that word bugs me.)

-Don't make chapters containing pedophilia. I'm mean you can but It will just get deleted. Underage characters are allowed in the story but please leave any adult content away from them.

-The Reducer can enlarge things too! So all that giantess/giant stuff is allowed too.

Those are the only rules so don't blow it. Seriously. Oh yeah and have fun!
